1428
1429def Rigid_CDOCKER(xcen = 0, ycen = 0, zcen = 0, maxlen = 10, dielec = 3,
1430                  rcta = 0, rctb = 0, hmax = 0, flag_grid = False, 
1431                  flag_rdie = True, flag_form = False, flag_delete_grid = True, 
1432                  probeFile = '"../Toppar/fftdock_c36prot_cgenff_probes.txt"',
1433                  softGridFile = 'grid-emax-0.6-mine--0.4-maxe-0.4.bin',
1434                  hardGridFile = 'grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin', 
1435                  nativeGridFile = 'grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin',
1436                  receptorPDB = './protein.pdb', receptorPSF = './protein.psf',
1437                  ligPDB = './ligand.pdb', ligSeg = 'LIGA', confDir = './conformer/', 
1438                  placementDir = './placement/',  exhaustiveness = 'high', 
1439                  numPlace = 100, numCopy = 1000, flag_delete_conformer= True,
1440                  flag_delete_placement = True, flag_save_all = True,
1441                  flag_save_cluster= True, flag_save_top = True,
1442                  flag_suppress_print = True, flag_center_ligand = True,
1443                  flag_fast_grid = False, flag_use_hbond = False,
1444                  flag_fast_placement = True, threshold = 2500,
1445                  sort_energy = 'total_energy', saveDir = './dockresult/'):
1446
1447    """Rigid CDOCKER standard docking method 
1448
1449    Parameters
1450    ----------
1451    xcen: float
1452           center of the docking pocket
1453    ycen: float
1454           center of the docking pocket
1455    zcen: float
1456           center of the docking pocket
1457    maxlen: float
1458             size of the grid box
1459    dielec: float
1460             dielectric constant 
1461    rcta: float
1462           customizable grid left cutoff
1463    rctb: float
1464           customizable grid right cutoff
1465    hmax: float
1466           customizable grid well-depth 
1467    flag_grid: bool
1468                whether or not grid need to be generated 
1469    flag_rdie: bool
1470                true for rdie, false for cdie 
1471    flag_form: bool
1472                whether or not grid form is formatted
1473    flag_delete_grid: bool
1474                       whether or not delete grid after calculation 
1475    probeFile: str
1476                gpu probe file names
1477    softGridFile: str
1478                   soft grid file name 
1479    hardGridFile: str
1480                   hard grid file name 
1481    nativeGridFile: str
1482                     native grid file name 
1483    receptorPDB: str 
1484              protein pdb file name
1485    receptorPSF: str 
1486              protein psf file name
1487    ligPDB: str
1488             ligand pdb file name
1489    ligSeg: str
1490             ligand segment ID
1491    confDir: str
1492              conformer folder name
1493    placementDir: str
1494                   placement folder name
1495    exhaustiveness: str
1496                     exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
1497    numPlace: int 
1498               number of placement for each conformer 
1499    numCopy: int 
1500              number of Copy for OpenMM docking simulated annealing
1501    flag_delete_conformer: bool
1502                            whether or not delete conformer after docking 
1503    flag_delete_placement: bool
1504                            whether or not delete placement after docking 
1505    flag_save_all: bool
1506                    whether or not save all docked pose 
1507    flag_save_cluster: bool
1508                        whether or not save clustered results 
1509    flag_save_top: bool
1510                    whether or not save top 10 lowest energy pose 
1511    flag_suppress_print: bool
1512                          whether or not suppress printing
1513    flag_fast_grid: bool
1514                     whether or not just use grid minimize result i.e., skip all atom mini
1515    flag_center_ligand: bool
1516                         whether or not ligand need to be centered
1517    flag_use_hbond : bool
1518                     whether or not use hydrogen/covalent bond in RCDOCKER 
1519    flag_fast_placement : bool
1520                          whether or not use fast placement
1521    threshold : float
1522                cutoff threshold for original RCDOCKER placement
1523                only meaningful when flag_fast_placement = True
1524    sort_energy: str
1525                  sorting method 
1526    saveDir: str
1527              folder name for docked result 
1528
1529    Returns
1530    -------
1531    clusterResult : pd.DataFrame
1532         clustering result 
1533    dockResult : pd.DataFrame
1534         docking result 
1535    """
1536    ## Generate grids for docking if no grid files generated before
1537    if not flag_grid:
1538        if hmax > 0: hmax = 0
1539        if not flag_use_hbond: hmax = 0
1540        if psf.get_natom() > 0: psf.delete_atoms()
1541        read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
1542        read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
1543
1544        genGrid = grid.Grid()
1545        gridSet = {'xCen': xcen, 'yCen': ycen, 'zCen': zcen,
1546                   'xMax': maxlen, 'yMax': maxlen, 'zMax': maxlen,
1547                   'dielec': dielec, 'flag_rdie': flag_rdie,
1548                   'rcta': rcta, 'rctb': rctb, 'hMax': hmax,
1549                   'emax': 0.6, 'maxe': 0.4, 'mine': -0.4, 'gridFile': softGridFile,
1550                   'probeFile': probeFile, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'flag_grhb' : flag_use_hbond} 
1551        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
1552        status = genGrid.generate()
1553        print("Grid generation for " + softGridFile +  " is ", status)
1554
1555        gridSet = {'emax': 3, 'maxe': 30, 'mine': -30, 'gridFile': hardGridFile}
1556        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
1557        status = genGrid.generate()
1558        print("Grid generation for " + hardGridFile +  " is ", status)
1559
1560        gridSet = {'emax': 100, 'maxe': 100, 'mine': -100, 'gridFile': nativeGridFile}
1561        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
1562        status = genGrid.generate()
1563        print("Grid generation for " + nativeGridFile +  " is ", status)
1564
1565        ## Update nonbond interactions
1566        if flag_rdie:
1567            update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1568              atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1569              elec = True, rdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1570              emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1571        else:
1572            update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1573              atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1574              elec = True, cdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1575              emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1576
1577    ## Ligand initial placement
1578    if flag_suppress_print:
1579        settings.set_verbosity(1)
1580        settings.set_warn_level(1)
1581        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
1582
1583    if flag_fast_placement :
1584        numConf, numPlace = RCDOCKER_fast_init_place(receptorPDB = receptorPDB, receptorPSF = receptorPSF,
1585                            ligPDB = ligPDB, ligSeg = ligSeg, confDir = confDir,
1586                            placementDir = placementDir, exhaustiveness = exhaustiveness,
1587                            flag_center_ligand = flag_center_ligand, xcen = xcen,
1588                            ycen = ycen, zcen = zcen, numPlace = numPlace)
1589    else :
1590        numConf, numPlace = RCDOCKER_init_place(ligPDB = ligPDB, ligSeg = ligSeg,
1591                            hardGridFile = hardGridFile, nativeGridFile = nativeGridFile,
1592                            confDir = confDir, placementDir = placementDir,
1593                            flag_center_ligand = flag_center_ligand,
1594                            flag_use_hbond = flag_use_hbond, flag_form = flag_form,
1595                            flag_rdie = flag_rdie, dielec = dielec,
1596                            xcen = xcen, ycen = ycen, zcen = zcen,
1597                            numPlace = numPlace, threshold = threshold)
1598
1599    settings.set_verbosity(5)
1600    settings.set_warn_level(5)
1601    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1602
1603    ## Update nonbond interactions
1604    if flag_rdie:
1605        update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1606          atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1607          elec = True, rdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1608          emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1609    else:
1610        update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1611          atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1612          elec = True, cdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1613          emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1614
1615    ## Get docking trials / number of OpenMM docking needed
1616    num = numConf * numPlace 
1617    trial = num // numCopy
1618    remindar = num % numCopy
1619    dockResult = np.zeros([num, 2])
1620
1621    ## Run OMMD docking
1622    idxBatch = 0
1623    gridVdw = []
1624    gridElec = []
1625    gridHbon = []
1626    totalEner = []
1627    allPose = []
1628    conformerPose = []
1629    placementPose = []
1630    placementID = 1
1631    conformerID = 1
1632    ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms(seg_id = ligSeg) 
1633
1634    if remindar > 0:
1635        ommd = grid.OMMD()
1636        ommdSet = {'softGridFile': softGridFile, 'hardGridFile': hardGridFile,
1637                   'flex_select': ligand, 'numCopy': remindar, 
1638                   'flag_form' : flag_form, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
1639        ommd.setVar(ommdSet)
1640        ommd.create()
1641        print("OMMD set up for batch ", idxBatch)
1642        
1643        if flag_suppress_print:
1644            settings.set_verbosity(1)
1645            settings.set_warn_level(1)
1646            settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
1647
1648        idxCopy = 1
1649        while idxCopy <= remindar:
1650            read.pdb(placementDir + str(placementID) + '.pdb', resid = True)
1651            ommd.set_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1652            print("Set OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1653            placementID += 1
1654            idxCopy += 1
1655 
1656        default_ommd_sian(ommd)
1657 
1658        nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
1659        nativeSet = {'selection': ligand, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': 
1660                      nativeGridFile, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
1661        nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
1662        nativeGrid.read()
1663        
1664        i = 1
1665        idxCopy = 1
1666        while idxCopy <= remindar:
1667            ommd.copy_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1668            print("Minimize OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1669            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1670            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 1e-3)
1671            allEner = energy.get_energy()
1672            dockPose = str(conformerID) + "_" + str(i) + ".pdb"
1673            tmpTotal = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'energy']['value'].values[0] 
1674            tmpGrvdw = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grvdw']['value'].values[0]
1675            tmpGrelec = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grelec']['value'].values[0] 
1676            tmpGrhb = energy.get_eterm(111)
1677            write.coor_pdb(dockPose, title = '''Title
1678                       * The conformer ID is %d 
1679                       * The dock pose ID is %d
1680                       * The total energy is %8.6f 
1681                       * The total grid energy is %8.6f
1682                       * Grid vdw, elec and hbond energy is 
1683                       * %8.6f, %8.6f and %8.6f''' 
1684                       % (conformerID, i, tmpTotal, tmpGrvdw + tmpGrelec + tmpGrhb, 
1685                       tmpGrvdw, tmpGrelec, tmpGrhb)) 
1686            totalEner.append(tmpTotal)
1687            gridVdw.append(tmpGrvdw)
1688            gridElec.append(tmpGrelec)
1689            gridHbon.append(tmpGrhb)
1690            conformerPose.append(conformerID)
1691            placementPose.append(i)
1692            allPose.append(dockPose)
1693            i += 1
1694            if i > numPlace:
1695                i = 1
1696                conformerID += 1
1697            idxCopy += 1
1698 
1699        nativeGrid.off()
1700        nativeGrid.clear()
1701        nativeSet.clear()
1702        ommd.clear()
1703        ommdSet.clear()
1704        settings.set_verbosity(5)
1705        settings.set_warn_level(5)
1706        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1707
1708    idxBatch += 1
1709    if idxBatch <= trial:
1710        ommd = grid.OMMD()
1711        ommdSet = {'softGridFile': softGridFile, 'hardGridFile': hardGridFile,  
1712                   'flex_select': ligand, 'numCopy': numCopy,
1713                   'flag_form' : flag_form, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
1714        ommd.setVar(ommdSet)
1715        ommd.create()
1716 
1717        if flag_suppress_print:
1718            settings.set_verbosity(1)
1719            settings.set_warn_level(1)
1720            settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
1721
1722        while idxBatch <= trial:
1723            print("OMMD set up for batch ", idxBatch) 
1724            
1725            idxCopy = 1
1726            while idxCopy <= numCopy:
1727                read.pdb(placementDir + str(placementID) + '.pdb', resid = True)
1728                ommd.set_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1729                print("Set OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1730                placementID += 1
1731                idxCopy += 1
1732  
1733            default_ommd_sian(ommd)
1734  
1735            nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
1736            nativeSet = {'selection': ligand, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': 
1737                          nativeGridFile, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond} 
1738            nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
1739            nativeGrid.read()
1740 
1741            i = 1
1742            idxCopy = 1
1743            while idxCopy <= numCopy:
1744                ommd.copy_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1745                print("Minimize OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1746                minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1747                minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 1e-3)
1748                allEner = energy.get_energy()
1749                dockPose = str(conformerID) + "_" + str(i) + ".pdb"
1750                tmpTotal = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'energy']['value'].values[0] 
1751                tmpGrvdw = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grvdw']['value'].values[0]
1752                tmpGrelec = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grelec']['value'].values[0] 
1753                tmpGrhb = energy.get_eterm(111)
1754                write.coor_pdb(dockPose, title = '''Title
1755                           * The conformer ID is %d 
1756                           * The dock pose ID is %d
1757                           * The total energy is %8.6f 
1758                           * The total grid energy is %8.6f
1759                           * Grid vdw, elec and hbond energy is 
1760                           * %8.6f, %8.6f and %8.6f''' 
1761                           % (conformerID, i, tmpTotal, tmpGrvdw + tmpGrelec + tmpGrhb, 
1762                           tmpGrvdw, tmpGrelec, tmpGrhb)) 
1763                totalEner.append(tmpTotal)
1764                gridVdw.append(tmpGrvdw)
1765                gridElec.append(tmpGrelec)
1766                gridHbon.append(tmpGrhb)
1767                conformerPose.append(conformerID)
1768                placementPose.append(i)
1769                allPose.append(dockPose)
1770                i += 1
1771                if i > numPlace:
1772                    i = 1
1773                    conformerID += 1
1774                idxCopy += 1
1775 
1776            nativeGrid.off()
1777            nativeGrid.clear()
1778            nativeSet.clear() 
1779            idxBatch += 1
1780 
1781        ommd.clear()
1782        ommdSet.clear()
1783        settings.set_verbosity(5)
1784        settings.set_warn_level(5)
1785        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1786
1787    ## Save docking result for all docked pose
1788    dockResult = pd.DataFrame()
1789    dockResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
1790    dockResult["grid_total"] = np.asarray(gridVdw) + np.asarray(gridElec) + np.asarray(gridHbon)
1791    dockResult["grid_vdw"] = gridVdw
1792    dockResult["grid_elec"] = gridElec
1793    dockResult["grid_hbond"] = gridHbon
1794    dockResult["conformer_id"] = conformerPose
1795    dockResult["placement_id"] = placementPose
1796    dockResult["PDB_name"] = allPose
1797
1798    ## Cluster and sort docking pose
1799    conformerID = 1
1800    clusterResult = pd.DataFrame(columns = list(dockResult.columns).append('cluster_size'))
1801    while conformerID <= numConf:
1802        conformerName = str(conformerID) + '_*'
1803        radius = scan_cluster_radius(name = conformerName)
1804        tmp = rcdocker_default_sort(radius = radius, name = conformerName)
1805 
1806        clusterResult = pd.concat([clusterResult, sort_cluster(pdb_files = tmp,
1807                       dock_result = dockResult, sort_method = "total_energy")],
1808                       ignore_index = True)
1809 
1810        conformerID += 1
1811
1812    ## Sort dataframe and save grid docking results 
1813    _mkdir_(saveDir)
1814    dockResult = dockResult.sort_values(by = ["total_energy"], ignore_index = True)
1815    dockResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'dockResult.tsv', sep = '	')
1816    clusterResult = clusterResult.sort_values(by = ["total_energy"], ignore_index = True)
1817    clusterResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'clusterResult.tsv', sep = '	')
1818
1819    ## Explicit atom minimization
1820    if not flag_fast_grid:
1821        psf.delete_atoms()
1822        read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
1823        read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
1824        read.sequence_pdb(ligPDB)
1825        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)        ## for 3-mem ring
1826        gen.new_segment(seg_name = ligSeg)
1827        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1828        read.pdb(ligPDB, resid = True)
1829        ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(ligSeg)
1830        cons_fix.setup(ligand.__invert__())
1831
1832    ## Minimize cluster result
1833        vdw = []
1834        elec = []
1835        totalEner = []
1836        _rm_("cluster_*")
1837        pdbID = clusterResult['PDB_name'].tolist()
1838        grid_hbond = clusterResult['grid_hbond'].tolist()
1839        conformer_id = clusterResult["conformer_id"].tolist() 
1840        placement_id = clusterResult["placement_id"].tolist()
1841        cluster_size = clusterResult["cluster_size"].tolist()
1842        for idx in np.arange(len(pdbID)):
1843            read.pdb(str(pdbID[idx]), resid = True)
1844            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1845            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 0.001)
1846            tmptotal = energy.get_total() + grid_hbond[idx]
1847            tmpelec = energy.get_elec()
1848            tmpvdw = energy.get_vdw()
1849            totalEner.append(tmptotal)
1850            elec.append(tmpelec)
1851            vdw.append(tmpvdw)
1852        
1853            write.coor_pdb("cluster_" + str(pdbID[idx]),
1854                           selection = ligand, title = '''Title
1855                           * The docked pose ID is %s
1856                           * The conformer ID is %d
1857                           * The placement ID is %d
1858                           * The total energy is %8.6f
1859                           * The vdw energy is %8.6f
1860                           * The elec energy is %8.6f
1861                           * The grid_hbond is %8.6f '''
1862                           % (pdbID[idx], conformer_id[idx], placement_id[idx], 
1863                           tmptotal, tmpvdw, tmpelec, grid_hbond[idx]))
1864
1865        explicitCluster = pd.DataFrame()
1866        explicitCluster["total_energy"] = totalEner
1867        explicitCluster["vdw"] = vdw
1868        explicitCluster["elec"] = elec
1869        explicitCluster["grid_hbond"] = grid_hbond
1870        explicitCluster["conformer_id"] = conformer_id
1871        explicitCluster["placement_id"] = placement_id
1872        explicitCluster["PDB_name"] = pdbID
1873        explicitCluster["cluster_size"] = cluster_size
1874
1875	## Minimize top10 result
1876        vdw = []
1877        elec = []
1878        totalEner = []
1879        _rm_("top10_*")
1880        pdbID = dockResult['PDB_name'].tolist()[0:11]
1881        grid_hbond = dockResult['grid_hbond'].tolist()[0:11]
1882        conformer_id = dockResult["conformer_id"].tolist()[0:11]
1883        placement_id = dockResult["placement_id"].tolist()[0:11]
1884        for idx in np.arange(len(pdbID)):
1885            read.pdb(str(pdbID[idx]), resid = True)
1886            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1887            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 0.001)
1888            tmptotal = energy.get_total() + grid_hbond[idx]
1889            tmpelec = energy.get_elec()
1890            tmpvdw = energy.get_vdw()
1891            totalEner.append(tmptotal)
1892            elec.append(tmpelec)
1893            vdw.append(tmpvdw)
1894        
1895            write.coor_pdb("top10_" + str(pdbID[idx]),
1896                           selection = ligand, title = '''Title
1897                           * The docked pose ID is %s
1898                           * The conformer ID is %d
1899                           * The placement ID is %d
1900                           * The total energy is %8.6f
1901                           * The vdw energy is %8.6f
1902                           * The elec energy is %8.6f
1903                           * The grid_hbond is %8.6f '''
1904                           % (pdbID[idx], conformer_id[idx], placement_id[idx], 
1905                           tmptotal, tmpvdw, tmpelec, grid_hbond[idx]))
1906
1907        explicitTop10 = pd.DataFrame()
1908        explicitTop10["total_energy"] = totalEner
1909        explicitTop10["vdw"] = vdw
1910        explicitTop10["elec"] = elec
1911        explicitTop10["grid_hbond"] = grid_hbond
1912        explicitTop10["conformer_id"] = conformer_id
1913        explicitTop10["placement_id"] = placement_id
1914        explicitTop10["PDB_name"] = pdbID
1915
1916    ## Sort dataframe and save explicit atom minimization results 
1917    if not flag_fast_grid:
1918        explicitTop10 = explicitTop10.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], 
1919                        ignore_index = True)
1920        explicitTop10.to_csv(saveDir + 'explicitTop10.tsv', sep = '	')
1921        explicitCluster = explicitCluster.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], 
1922                          ignore_index = True)
1923        explicitCluster.to_csv(saveDir + 'explicitCluster.tsv', sep = '	')
1924
1925    ## Clean and save results
1926    if flag_save_cluster:
1927        idx = 1
1928        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'cluster/')
1929        print("Save cluster result for each conformer")
1930        if flag_fast_grid:
1931            pdbList = clusterResult['PDB_name'].tolist()
1932            for pdb in pdbList:
1933                source = str(pdb)
1934                target = saveDir + 'cluster/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1935                _cp_(source, target)
1936                idx += 1
1937        else:
1938            pdbList = explicitCluster['PDB_name'].tolist()
1939            for pdb in pdbList:
1940                source = "cluster_" + str(pdb)
1941                target = saveDir + 'cluster/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1942                _cp_(source, target)
1943                idx += 1
1944
1945    if flag_save_top:
1946        idx = 1
1947        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'top_ener/')
1948        print("Save top 10 lowest energy pose")
1949        if flag_fast_grid:
1950            pdbList = dockResult['PDB_name'].tolist()[0:11]
1951            topEnergy = dockResult["total_energy"].tolist()[0:10]
1952            if topEnergy[-1] - topEnergy[0] < 1: 
1953                print("Please check dockResult.tsv, not all poses within 1 kcal/mol cutoff are saved")
1954            for pdb in pdbList[0:10]:
1955                source = str(pdb)
1956                target = saveDir + 'top_ener/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1957                _cp_(source, target)
1958                idx += 1
1959        else:
1960            pdbList = explicitTop10['PDB_name'].tolist()[0:11]
1961            topEnergy = explicitTop10[sort_energy].tolist()[0:10]
1962            if topEnergy[-1] - topEnergy[0] < 1: 
1963                print("Please check explicitTop10.tsv, not all poses within 1 kcal/mol cutoff are saved")
1964            for pdb in pdbList[0:10]:
1965                source = "top10_" + str(pdb)
1966                target = saveDir + 'top_ener/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1967                _cp_(source, target)
1968                idx += 1
1969
1970    if flag_save_all: 
1971        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'allPose/')
1972        _mv_('[0-9]*', saveDir + 'allPose/')
1973
1974    if not flag_fast_grid: _rm_("cluster_* top10_*")
1975    if flag_delete_conformer: _rm_(confDir)
1976    if flag_delete_placement: _rm_(placementDir)
1977    if flag_delete_grid: _rm_(nativeGridFile + ' ' + softGridFile + ' ' + hardGridFile) 
1978
1979    _rm_('[0-9]* tmp* cluster.log')
1980    return clusterResult, dockResult
1981
1982################################################################
1983##
1984##		Begin of pyCHARMM Flexible CDOCKER
1985##
1986################################################################
1987
1988def Flexible_CDOCKER(xcen = 0, ycen = 0, zcen = 0, maxlen = 10, num = 20, copy = 25, 
1989                     generation = 2, threshold_init = 2500, threshold_mutate = 100, 
1990                     flag_grid = False, flag_form = False, flag_delete_grid = True, 
1991                     probeFile = '"../Toppar/fftdock_c36prot_cgenff_probes.txt"',
1992                     softGridFile = 'grid-emax-0.6-mine--0.4-maxe-0.4.bin',
1993                     hardGridFile = 'grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin', 
1994                     nativeGridFile = 'grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin',
1995                     receptorPDB = './protein.pdb', receptorPSF = './protein.psf',
1996                     receptorCard = '"./flexchain.crd"', saveLig = './ligand/', saveProt = './protein/', 
1997                     crossoverLig = './crossover_ligand/', crossoverProt = './crossover_protein/',
1998                     saveLigFinal = './ligand_final/', saveProtFinal = './protein_final/',
1999                     ligPDB = './ligand.pdb', ligSeg = 'LIGA', flexchain = None,  
2000                     placementDir = './placement/',  flag_save_all = False,
2001                     flag_save_cluster= True, flag_save_placement = False,
2002                     flag_save_crossover = False, flag_suppress_print = True, 
2003                     flag_center_ligand = True, flag_fast_grid = False,
2004                     flag_fast_placement = False, exhaustiveness = 'high', top_N_result = 10,
2005                     sort_energy = 'total_energy', saveDir = './dockresult/'): 
2006
2007    """Flexible CDOCKER standard docking method 
2008
2009    Parameters
2010    ----------
2011    xcen: float
2012           center of the docking pocket
2013    ycen: float
2014           center of the docking pocket
2015    zcen: float
2016           center of the docking pocket
2017    maxlen: float
2018             size of the grid box
2019    num: float
2020          number of conformer 
2021    copy: float
2022           number of copies for each conformer 
2023    threshold_init: float
2024                     energy threshold for initial placement 
2025    threshold_mutate: float
2026                       energy threshold for mutation 
2027    flag_grid: bool
2028                whether or not grid need to be generated 
2029    flag_form: bool
2030                whether or not grid form is formatted
2031    flag_delete_grid: bool
2032                       whether or not delete grid after calculation 
2033    probeFile: str
2034                gpu probe file names
2035    softGridFile: str
2036                   soft grid file name 
2037    hardGridFile: str
2038                   hard grid file name 
2039    nativeGridFile: str
2040                     native grid file name 
2041    receptorPDB: str 
2042              protein pdb file name
2043    receptorPSF: str 
2044              protein psf file name
2045    receptorCard: str
2046                   receptor coordinate card name
2047    saveLig: str
2048              ligand docked result saved folder name
2049    saveProt: str
2050               protein docked result saved folder name
2051    crossoverLig: str
2052                   crossover ligand folder before mutation
2053    crossoverProt: str
2054                    crossover protein folder before mutation
2055    saveLigFinal: str
2056                   ligand final docked result saved folder name
2057    saveProtFinal: str
2058                    protein final docked result saved folder name
2059    ligPDB: str
2060             ligand pdb file name
2061    ligSeg: str
2062             ligand segment ID
2063    flexchain: pd.DataFrame
2064                dataframe of the flexchain selection
2065    placementDir: str
2066                   placement folder name
2067    flag_save_all: bool
2068                    whether or not save all docked pose 
2069    flag_save_cluster: bool
2070                        whether or not save clustered results 
2071    flag_save_placement: bool
2072                          whether or not save inital placement after docking 
2073    flag_save_crossover: bool
2074                          whether or not save crossover after docking
2075    flag_suppress_print: bool
2076                          whether or not suppress printing
2077    flag_center_ligand: bool
2078                         whether or not ligand need to be centered
2079    flag_fast_grid: bool
2080                     whether or not just use grid minimize result i.e., skip all atom mini
2081    flag_fast_placement : bool
2082                          whether or not use fast initial placement
2083    exhaustiveness : str
2084                     exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
2085    top_N_result: int
2086                   number of top N clusters, final generation uses top N + 5 clusters
2087    sort_energy: str
2088                  sorting method 
2089    saveDir: str
2090              folder name for docked result 
2091
2092    Returns
2093    -------
2094    clusterResult: pd.DataFrame
2095          clustering result 
2096    dockResult : pd.DataFrame 
2097          docking result 
2098    """
2099    ## Center ligand if flag_center_ligand = True
2100    if flag_center_ligand:
2101        read.sequence_pdb(ligPDB)
2102        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)        ## for 3-mem ring
2103        gen.new_segment(seg_name = ligSeg)
2104        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
2105        read.pdb(ligPDB, resid = True)
2106        ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(ligSeg)
2107    
2108        xyz = coor.get_positions().to_numpy()
2109        gridCenter = np.array([xcen, ycen, zcen])
2110        ligCenter = (np.amin(xyz, axis = 0) + np.amax(xyz, axis = 0)) / 2
2111        xyz = xyz - ligCenter + gridCenter
2112        new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(xyz, columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
2113        coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
2114        write.coor_pdb(ligPDB, selection = ligand, title = '''Title
2115                       * Move ligand to the center of binding pocket''')
2116
2117    ## Generate grids for docking if no grid files generated before
2118    if not flag_grid:
2119        ## Read in protein and prepare flex side chain selection
2120        if psf.get_natom() > 0: psf.delete_atoms()
2121        read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
2122        read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
2123
2124        for idx, row in flexchain.iterrows():
2125            resid = str(row['res_id'])
2126            segid = row['seg_id']
2127            tmpI = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_res_id(res_id = resid)
2128            tmpJ = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(seg_id = segid)
2129            if idx == 0:
2130                flexSideChain = tmpI & tmpJ
2131            else:
2132                flexSideChain = flexSideChain | (tmpI & tmpJ)
2133
2134        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
2135        psf.delete_atoms(flexSideChain)
2136        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
2137
2138	## Generate grids for docking
2139        genGrid = grid.Grid()
2140        gridSet = {'xCen': xcen, 'yCen': ycen, 'zCen': zcen,
2141                   'xMax': maxlen, 'yMax': maxlen, 'zMax': maxlen,
2142                   'emax': 0.6, 'maxe': 0.4, 'mine': -0.4, 'gridFile': softGridFile,
2143                   'flag_form' : flag_form, 'probeFile': probeFile} 
2144        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
2145        status = genGrid.generate()
2146        print("Grid generation for " + softGridFile +  " is ", status)
2147
2148        gridSet = {'emax': 3, 'maxe': 30, 'mine': -30, 'gridFile': hardGridFile}
2149        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
2150        status = genGrid.generate()
2151        print("Grid generation for " + hardGridFile +  " is ", status)
2152
2153        gridSet = {'emax': 100, 'maxe': 100, 'mine': -100, 'gridFile': nativeGridFile}
2154        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
2155        status = genGrid.generate()
2156        print("Grid generation for " + nativeGridFile +  " is ", status)
2157
2158    ## Fast initial placement
2159    if flag_fast_placement :
2160        FCDOCKER_fast_init_place(receptorPDB = receptorPDB, receptorPSF = receptorPSF,
2161                                 ligPDB = ligPDB, ligSeg = ligSeg, placementDir = placementDir,
2162                                 exhaustiveness = exhaustiveness, num = num, copy = copy)
2163
2164    ## Prepare protein explicit atoms 
2165    if psf.get_natom() > 0: psf.delete_atoms()
2166    read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
2167    read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
2168
2169    for idx, row in flexchain.iterrows():
2170        resid = str(row['res_id'])
2171        segid = row['seg_id']
2172        tmpI = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_res_id(res_id = resid)
2173        tmpJ = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(seg_id = segid)
2174        if idx == 0:
2175            flexSideChain = tmpI & tmpJ
2176        else:
2177            flexSideChain = flexSideChain | (tmpI & tmpJ)
2178    settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
2179    psf.delete_atoms(flexSideChain.__invert__())
2180    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
2181    
2182    ## Read in ligand
2183    read.sequence_pdb(ligPDB)
2184    settings.set_bomb_level(-1)        ## for 3-mem ring
2185    gen.new_segment(seg_name = ligSeg)
2186    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
2187    read.pdb(ligPDB, resid = True)
2188    ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(ligSeg)
2189    
2190    ## Declare receptor(protein) backbone 
2191    backboneAtom = ['N', 'CA', 'C', 'O', 'HA', 'HN', 'HA1', 'HA2',
2192                    'HT1', 'HT2', 'HT3', 'OT1', 'OT2']
2193    backboneAtom = np.asarray(backboneAtom)
2194    for idx in np.arange(len(backboneAtom)):
2195        atom = backboneAtom[idx]
2196        if idx == 0: backbone = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_atom_type(atom)
2197        backbone = backbone | pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_atom_type(atom)
2198    
2199    ## Define fix part and flex part of the system
2200    fixsc = ligand.__invert__() & backbone
2201    flexsc = fixsc.__invert__()
2202    receptor = ligand.__invert__()
2203    cons_fix.setup(fixsc)
2204    write.coor_card(receptorCard, selection = receptor, title = '''Title
2205                    * Receptor Side Chain Initial Position''')
2206    
2207    ## Update nonbond interactions 
2208    update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
2209      atom = True,
2210      switch = True,
2211      vswitch = True,
2212      vdwe = True,
2213      elec = True,
2214      rdie = True,
2215      cutnb = 12,
2216      ctofnb = 10,
2217      ctonnb = 8,
2218      emax = 10000,
2219      maxe = 10000,
2220      mine = -10000,
2221      epsilon = 3).run()
2222
2223    ## Coor stats
2224    allCoor = coor.get_positions()
2225    allCoor['atomIndex'] = np.arange(np.shape(list(ligand))[0])
2226    ligand_xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(ligand)), ['x', 'y', 'z']]
2227    receptor_xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(receptor)), ['x', 'y', 'z', 'atomIndex']]
2228
2229    ligStat = coor.stat(selection = ligand)
2230    xcen = ligStat['xave']
2231    ycen = ligStat['yave']
2232    zcen = ligStat['zave']
2233
2234    ## Set up the OpenMM system
2235    ommd = grid.OMMD()
2236    ommdSet = {'softGridFile': softGridFile, 'hardGridFile': hardGridFile,
2237               'fix_select': fixsc, 'flex_select': flexsc, 
2238               'flag_form' : flag_form, 'numCopy': num * copy}
2239    ommd.setVar(ommdSet)
2240    ommd.create()
2241    print("OMMD set up for flexible docking")
2242    print("Flexible docking for the first generation")
2243    
2244    ## OpenMM docking for initial generation 
2245    if flag_suppress_print:
2246        settings.set_verbosity(1)
2247        settings.set_warn_level(1)
2248        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
2249    if not flag_fast_placement :
2250        FCDOCKER_init_place(receptorCard= receptorCard, receptorSel = receptor, flexSel = flexsc,
2251                            ligSel = ligand, ligPDB = ligPDB, ligSeg = ligSeg,
2252                            hardGridFile = hardGridFile, nativeGridFile = nativeGridFile,
2253                            placementDir = placementDir, num = num, copy = copy, 
2254                            threshold = threshold_init, flag_form = flag_form)
2255    
2256    idxCopy = 1
2257    while idxCopy <= num * copy:
2258        read.pdb(placementDir + str(idxCopy) + '.pdb', resid = True)
2259        ommd.set_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
2260        print("Set OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
2261        idxCopy += 1
2262	
2263    default_ommd_sian(ommd)
2264    _rm_('[0-9]*')
2265    
2266    hardSet = {'selection': flexsc, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': hardGridFile}
2267    hardGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
2268    hardGrid.setVar(hardSet)
2269    hardGrid.read()
2270    energy.show()
2271    idxCopy = 1
2272    _mkdir_(saveLig + ' ' + saveProt)
2273    dockEner = []
2274    while idxCopy <= num * copy:

2517

2521        clusterResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
2522        clusterResult["enthalpy"] = np.asarray(totalEner) - entropy
2523        clusterResult["vdw"] = vdw
2524        clusterResult["elec"] = elec
2525        clusterResult["entropy"] = entropy
2526        clusterResult["cluster_size"] = cluster_size
2527        clusterResult["PDB_name"] = pdbID

2529    else:

2534        explicitResult["elec"] = elec
2535        explicitResult["entropy"] = entropy

2538

2541        pdbID = []
2542        entropy = []

2545        for cluster in clusterID: 
2546            tmp_result = explicitResult.loc[explicitResult['cluster_id'] == cluster]
2547            tmp_result = tmp_result.sort_values(by = ['enthalpy'], ignore_index = True)
2548            pdbID.append(tmp_result.iloc[0]['PDB_name'])
2549            tmp_result = tmp_result.to_numpy()
2550
2551            ## Get probability and ensemble average
2552            enthalpy = tmp_result[:, 1]
2553            enthalpy = enthalpy - np.amin(enthalpy)
2554            prob = - (1 / 0.593) * enthalpy
2555            prob = np.exp(prob)
2556            prob = prob / np.sum(prob)
2557            tmptotal = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 1] * prob)
2558            tmpvdw = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 2] * prob)
2559            tmpelec = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 3] * prob)
2560            tmpentropy = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 4] * prob)
2561            tmpcluster = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 6] * prob)
2562
2563            vdw.append(tmpvdw)
2564            elec.append(tmpelec)
2565            entropy.append(tmpentropy)
2566            totalEner.append(tmptotal + tmpentropy)
2567

2569        pdbID = pdbID.astype(int)
2570        clusterResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
2571        clusterResult["enthalpy"] = np.asarray(totalEner) - np.asarray(entropy)
2572        clusterResult["vdw"] = vdw
2573        clusterResult["elec"] = elec
2574        clusterResult["entropy"] = entropy
2575        clusterResult["cluster_size"] = cluster_size
2576        clusterResult["PDB_name"] = pdbID
2577        clusterResult["cluster_id"] = clusterID
2578
2579    dockResult = pd.DataFrame()
2580    dockResult["enthalpy"] = dock_result[:, 0]
2581    dockResult["PDB_name"] = dock_result[:, 1].astype(int)
2582    dockResult = dockResult.sort_values(by = ["enthalpy"], ignore_index = True)
2583
2584    ## Sort dataframe and save results
2585    clusterResult = clusterResult.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], ignore_index = True)
2586    pdbList = clusterResult['PDB_name'].tolist()
2587    idx = 1
2588    _mkdir_(saveLigFinal + ' ' + saveProtFinal)
2589    for pdb in pdbList:
2590        ## Copy Ligand
2591        source = 'tmpligand/' + str(pdb) + '.pdb'
2592        target = saveLigFinal + 'top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
2593        _cp_(source, target)
2594    
2595        ## Copy protein
2596        source = 'tmpprot/' + str(pdb) + '.pdb'
2597        target = saveProtFinal + 'top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
2598        _cp_(source, target)
2599    
2600        idx += 1
2601    
2602    ## Clean and save results
2603    _mkdir_(saveDir)
2604    _mv_('cluster.log', saveDir)
2605    clusterResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'clusterResult.tsv', sep = '	')
2606    dockResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'dockResult.tsv', sep = '	')

def calc_dihedral(xyz): 
204def calc_dihedral(xyz):
205    """Calculate dihedral angle entropy contribution 
206
207    Parameters
208    ----------
209    xyz: numpy 4 by 3 array 
210          4 points in xyz-coordinates
211    
212    Returns
213    -------
214    float
215          dihedral angles in degree
216    """
217    v1 = xyz[1, :] - xyz[0, :]
218    v2 = xyz[2, :] - xyz[1, :]
219    v3 = xyz[3, :] - xyz[2, :]
220
221    v1 = v1 / np.linalg.norm(v1)
222    v2 = v2 / np.linalg.norm(v2)
223    v3 = v3 / np.linalg.norm(v3)
224
225    n1 = np.cross(v1, v2)
226    n2 = np.cross(v2, v3)
227    m1 = np.cross(n1, v2)
228
229    x = n1 @ n2
230    y = m1 @ n2
231
232    rad = atan2(y, x)
233    return rad / pi * 180

Calculate dihedral angle entropy contribution

Parameters
  • xyz (numpy 4 by 3 array): 4 points in xyz-coordinates
Returns
  • float: dihedral angles in degree
def rand_rot_trans(xyz, max_rot=3.141592653589793, max_trans=2): 
236def rand_rot_trans(xyz, max_rot = pi, max_trans = 2):
237    """Random rotation and translation of the ligand
238
239    Parameters
240    ----------
241    xyz: np.array 
242          n by 3 array (i.e., xyz coordinates) 
243    max_rot: float 
244              maximum rotation angle (in radian) 
245    max_trans: float 
246                maximum translation 
247    
248    Returns
249    -------
250    np.array
251         new ligand xyz coordinates 
252    """
253    ## Get random rotation angle and translation distance
254    tmp = np.random.rand(2, 3) * 2 - 1
255    rand_trans = tmp[0, :] * max_trans
256    rot_vec = tmp[1, :] / np.linalg.norm(tmp[1, :])
257    max_rot = max_rot * (random() * 2 - 1)
258    matrix = R.from_rotvec(rot_vec * max_rot).as_matrix()
259
260    ## Random rotation and translation
261    ligCenter = (np.amin(xyz, axis = 0) + np.amax(xyz, axis = 0)) / 2
262    origin_xyz = xyz - ligCenter
263    tmp_xyz = origin_xyz @ matrix.T + ligCenter + rand_trans
264    return tmp_xyz

Random rotation and translation of the ligand

Parameters
  • xyz (np.array): n by 3 array (i.e., xyz coordinates)
  • max_rot (float): maximum rotation angle (in radian)
  • max_trans (float): maximum translation
Returns
  • np.array: new ligand xyz coordinates
def FACTS_rescore(fixAtomSel=None, steps=1000, tolgrd=0.001): 
267def FACTS_rescore(fixAtomSel = None, steps = 1000, tolgrd = 0.001):
268    """Default FACTS docking rescore method
269
270    Parameters
271    ----------
272    fixAtomSel : pycharmm.SelectAtoms
273                 fixed atoms that undergoes FACTS implicit solvent minimization
274    steps : int 
275            number of minimization steps
276    tolgrd : float
277             minimization tolerance (exit thresold)
278
279    Returns
280    -------
281    facts_ener : float
282                FACTS implicit solvent energy 
283    """
284
285    ## Non-bond option
286    lingo.charmm_script("faster on")
287    update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
288     nbxmod = 5, atom = True, cdiel = True, eps = 1, shift = True,
289     vatom = True, vdistance = True, vswitch = True, cutnb = 14.0, 
290     ctofnb = 12.0, ctonnb = 10.0, e14fac = 1.0, wmin = 1.5).run()
291    lingo.charmm_script("scalar wmain = radius")
292
293    ## FACTS implicit solvent setup
294    FACTS(tcps = 22, teps = 1, gamm = 0.015, 
295     tavw = True, conc = 0.1, temp = 298).run()
296
297    ## Minimiziation 
298    if fixAtomSel != None: cons_fix.setup(fixAtomSel)
299    minimize.run_abnr(nstep = steps, tolgrd = tolgrd)
300    if fixAtomSel != None: cons_fix.turn_off()
301
302    ## Get energy
303    energy.show()
304    facts_ener = energy.get_total()
305    return facts_ener

def RCDOCKER_init_place( ligPDB='./ligand.pdb', ligSeg='LIGA', hardGridFile='grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin', nativeGridFile='grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin', confDir='./conformer', placementDir='./placement', flag_center_ligand=True, flag_use_hbond=True, flag_form=False, flag_rdie=True, dielec=3, xcen=0, ycen=0, zcen=0, numPlace=100, threshold=2500): 
372def RCDOCKER_init_place(ligPDB = './ligand.pdb', ligSeg = 'LIGA',
373                        hardGridFile = 'grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin',
374                        nativeGridFile = 'grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin',
375                        confDir = './conformer', placementDir = './placement',
376                        flag_center_ligand = True, flag_use_hbond = True, 
377                        flag_form = False, flag_rdie = True, dielec = 3,
378                        xcen = 0, ycen = 0, zcen = 0, numPlace = 100, threshold = 2500):
379    """Rigid CDOCKER original initial placement
380
381    Parameters
382    ----------
383    ligPDB : str
384             ligand pdb file name
385    ligSeg : str
386             ligand segment ID
387    hardGridFile : str
388                   hard grid file name
389    nativeGridFile : str
390                     native grid file name
391    confDir : str
392              conformer folder name
393    placementDir : str
394                   placement folder name
395    flag_center_ligand : bool
396                         whether ligand needed to be centered or not
397    flag_use_hbond : bool
398                     whether hydrogen bond is used in ligand initial placement
399    flag_form: bool
400                whether or not the grid file is formatted
401    flag_rdie: bool
402                true for rdie, false for cdie 
403    dielec: float
404             dielectric constant
405    xcen : float
406           center of the docking pocket
407    ycen : float
408           center of the docking pocket
409    zcen : float
410           center of the docking pocket
411    numPlace : int
412               number of placement for each conformer
413    threshold : float
414                threshold for energy cutoff
415
416    Returns
417    -------
418    int
419        number of conformers
420    numPlace :  int
421        number of placement for each conformer
422    """
423    ## Prepare
424    gridCenter = np.asarray([xcen, ycen, zcen])
425    if psf.get_natom() > 0 : psf.delete_atoms()
426    read.sequence_pdb(ligPDB)
427    settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
428    gen.new_segment(seg_name = ligSeg)
429    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
430    read.pdb(ligPDB, resid = True)
431    ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(ligSeg)
432
433    ## Update nonbond interactions
434    if flag_rdie:
435        update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
436          atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
437          elec = True, rdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
438          emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
439    else:
440        update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
441          atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
442          elec = True, cdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
443          emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
444
445    ## Grid information
446    hardSet = {'selection' : ligand, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile' : 
447                hardGridFile, 'flag_grhb' : flag_use_hbond}
448    nativeSet = {'selection' : ligand, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile' : 
449                  nativeGridFile, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
450
451    ## Loop through conformers
452    idxCopy = 1
453    _mkdir_(placementDir)
454    for conformer in listdir(confDir):
455        read.pdb(confDir + conformer, resid = True)
456        minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.01)
457        minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.005)
458        totalener = energy.get_total() + threshold
459        xyz = coor.get_positions().to_numpy()
460        if flag_center_ligand :
461            ligCenter = (np.amin(xyz, axis = 0) + np.amax(xyz, axis = 0)) / 2
462            xyz = xyz - ligCenter + gridCenter
463            new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(xyz, columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
464            coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
465
466        ## Now start placement and save result
467        idxnum = 1
468        xyz = coor.get_positions().to_numpy()
469        while idxnum <= numPlace / 5:
470
471            ## Find initial conformer place
472            new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(rand_rot_trans(xyz), columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
473            coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
474
475            ## Minimize in Grids
476            hardGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
477            hardGrid.setVar(hardSet)
478            hardGrid.read()
479            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 100)
480            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 500, tolenr = 0.01)
481            hardGrid.off()
482            hardGrid.clear()
483
484            nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
485            nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
486            nativeGrid.read()
487            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
488            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 100, tolenr = 0.01)
489
490            ## Check energy
491            energy.show()
492            flag_mutate = False
493            allEner = energy.get_energy()
494            confEner = energy.get_total()
495            if confEner <= totalener : flag_mutate = True
496            if flag_use_hbond:
497                dockhbond = energy.get_eterm(111) 
498                if dockhbond > 0 : flag_mutate = False
499            nativeGrid.off()
500            nativeGrid.clear()
501
502            if flag_mutate :
503                tmpidx = 1
504                randomEner = confEner
505                while tmpidx <= 5:
506                    ## Random rotation and translation
507                    mutate_xyz = pd.DataFrame(rand_rot_trans(new_xyz.to_numpy(), max_rot = pi / 6),
508                                              columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
509                    coor.set_positions(mutate_xyz)
510
511                    ## Minimize in Grids
512                    hardGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
513                    hardGrid.setVar(hardSet)
514                    hardGrid.read()
515                    minimize.run_sd(nstep = 100)
516                    minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 500, tolenr = 0.01)
517                    hardGrid.off()
518                    hardGrid.clear()
519
520                    nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
521                    nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
522                    nativeGrid.read()
523                    minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
524                    minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 100, tolenr = 0.01)
525
526                    ## Check energy difference
527                    DEner = energy.get_total() - confEner
528                    nativeGrid.off()
529                    nativeGrid.clear()
530                    prob = _mutate_prob_(DEner)
531                    rand = random()
532
533                    if rand <= prob:
534                        print("Rigid CDOCKER ligand original placement", str(idxCopy))
535                        write.coor_pdb(placementDir + str(idxCopy) + ".pdb", title = '''Title
536                        * The conformer pdb is %s
537                        * Placement ID is %d and mutate ID is %d'''
538                        % (conformer, idxnum, tmpidx))
539                        idxCopy += 1
540                        tmpidx += 1
541
542                idxnum += 1
543    return len(listdir(confDir)), numPlace

Rigid CDOCKER original initial placement

Parameters
  • ligPDB (str): ligand pdb file name
  • ligSeg (str): ligand segment ID
  • hardGridFile (str): hard grid file name
  • nativeGridFile (str): native grid file name
  • confDir (str): conformer folder name
  • placementDir (str): placement folder name
  • flag_center_ligand (bool): whether ligand needed to be centered or not
  • flag_use_hbond (bool): whether hydrogen bond is used in ligand initial placement
  • flag_form (bool): whether or not the grid file is formatted
  • flag_rdie (bool): true for rdie, false for cdie
  • dielec (float): dielectric constant
  • xcen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • ycen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • zcen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • numPlace (int): number of placement for each conformer
  • threshold (float): threshold for energy cutoff
Returns
  • int: number of conformers
  • numPlace (int): number of placement for each conformer
def RCDOCKER_fast_init_place( receptorPDB='./protein.pdb', receptorPSF='./protein.psf', ligPDB='./ligand.pdb', ligSeg='LIGA', confDir='./conformer/', placementDir='./placement/', exhaustiveness='high', flag_center_ligand=True, xcen=0, ycen=0, zcen=0, numPlace=100): 
545def RCDOCKER_fast_init_place(receptorPDB = './protein.pdb', receptorPSF = './protein.psf',
546               ligPDB = './ligand.pdb', ligSeg = 'LIGA', confDir = './conformer/', 
547               placementDir = './placement/',  exhaustiveness = 'high', flag_center_ligand = True,  
548               xcen = 0, ycen = 0, zcen = 0, numPlace = 100):
549    """Rigid CDOCKER fast initial placement
550
551    Parameters
552    ----------
553    receptorPDB: str 
554              protein pdb file name
555    receptorPSF: str 
556              protein psf file name
557    ligPDB: str
558             ligand pdb file name
559    ligSeg: str
560             ligand segment ID
561    confDir: str
562              conformer folder name
563    placementDir: str
564                   placement folder name
565    exhaustiveness: str
566                     exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
567    flag_center_ligand: bool
568                         whether or not ligand need to be centered
569    xcen: float
570           center of the docking pocket
571    ycen: float
572           center of the docking pocket
573    zcen: float
574           center of the docking pocket
575    numPlace: int 
576               number of placement for each conformer 
577    
578    Returns
579    -------
580    int
581        number of conformers
582    numPlace : int
583        number of placement for each cnoformer 
584    """
585    ## Protein grid information
586    if psf.get_natom() > 0: psf.delete_atoms()
587    read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
588    read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
589    xyz = coor.get_positions().to_numpy()
590    protCenter = (np.amin(xyz, axis = 0) + np.max(xyz, axis = 0)) / 2 
591    xyz = xyz - protCenter
592    size, protGrid = _prot_grid(xyz)
593
594    ## Build ligand 
595    gridCenter = np.asarray([xcen, ycen, zcen]) 
596    psf.delete_atoms()
597    read.sequence_pdb(ligPDB)
598    settings.set_bomb_level(-1)        ## for 3-mem ring
599    gen.new_segment(seg_name = ligSeg)
600    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
601    read.pdb(ligPDB, resid = True)
602    num_atom = psf.get_natom() 
603
604    ## Check cutoff, default is high 
605    if exhaustiveness == 'high':
606        cutoff = int(num_atom * 0.1) + 1 
607    elif exhaustiveness == 'medium':
608        cutoff = int(num_atom * 0.2) + 1
609    elif exhaustiveness == 'low':
610        cutoff = int(num_atom * 0.5) + 1
611    else:
612        cutoff = int(num_atom * 0.1) + 1 
613
614    ## Loop through conformers
615    idxCopy = 1
616    _mkdir_(placementDir)
617    for conformer in listdir(confDir):
618        read.pdb(confDir + conformer, resid = True)
619        xyz = coor.get_positions().to_numpy()
620        if flag_center_ligand:
621            ligCenter = (np.amin(xyz, axis = 0) + np.amax(xyz, axis = 0)) / 2
622            xyz = xyz - ligCenter + gridCenter
623            new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(xyz, columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
624            coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
625
626        ## Now start placement and save result
627        idxnum = 1
628        while idxnum <= numPlace / 5:
629
630            ## Find initial conformer place
631            tmp_xyz = rand_rot_trans(xyz)
632            ligGrid = _lig_grid(tmp_xyz, size, protCenter)
633            conformer_score = np.sum(protGrid * ligGrid)
634            if conformer_score <= cutoff:
635                conformer_xyz = tmp_xyz
636                tmpidx = 1
637
638                ## Mutate conformer position, save pose based on probability 
639                while tmpidx <= 5:
640                    tmp_xyz = rand_rot_trans(xyz, max_rot = pi / 6, max_trans = 1)
641                    ligGrid = _lig_grid(tmp_xyz, size, protCenter)
642                    score = conformer_score - np.sum(protGrid * ligGrid)
643                    prob = exp(score)
644                    rand = random()
645
646                    if prob > rand: 
647                        new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(tmp_xyz, columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
648                        coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
649                        print("Ligand placement ", str(idxCopy))
650                        write.coor_pdb(placementDir + str(idxCopy) + ".pdb", title = '''Title
651                        * The conformer pdb is %s 
652                        * Placement ID is %d and mutate ID is %d and the score is %d
653                        * The exp(score) is %8.6f and cutoff is %8.6f''' 
654                        % (conformer, idxnum, tmpidx, score, prob, rand)) 
655                        tmpidx += 1
656                        idxCopy += 1
657                        
658                idxnum += 1
659    return len(listdir(confDir)), numPlace

Rigid CDOCKER fast initial placement

Parameters

  • receptorPSF (str): protein psf file name
  • ligPDB (str): ligand pdb file name
  • ligSeg (str): ligand segment ID
  • confDir (str): conformer folder name
  • placementDir (str): placement folder name
  • exhaustiveness (str): exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
  • flag_center_ligand (bool): whether or not ligand need to be centered
  • xcen (float): center of the docking pocket

  • zcen (float): center of the docking pocket

  • int: number of conformers
  • numPlace (int): number of placement for each cnoformer
def FCDOCKER_init_place( receptorCard='./flexchain.crd', receptorSel=None, flexSel=None, ligSel=None, ligPDB='./ligand.pdb', ligSeg='LIGA', hardGridFile='grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin', nativeGridFile='grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin', placementDir='./placement/', num=20, copy=25, threshold=2500, flag_form=False): 
666def FCDOCKER_init_place(receptorCard= './flexchain.crd', receptorSel = None, flexSel = None,
667                        ligSel = None, ligPDB = './ligand.pdb', ligSeg = "LIGA",
668                        hardGridFile = 'grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin',
669                        nativeGridFile = 'grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin',
670                        placementDir = './placement/', num = 20, copy = 25, 
671                        threshold = 2500, flag_form = False):
672    """Flexible CDOCKER initial placement
673
674    Parameters
675    ----------
676    receptorCard: str 
677                   receptor coordinate card 
678    receptorSel: str 
679                  receptor selection 
680    flexSel: str
681              flexible part selection
682    ligSel: str
683             ligand selection 
684    ligPDB: str
685             ligand pdb file name
686    ligSeg: str
687             ligand segment ID
688    hardGridFile: str
689                   hard grid file name 
690    nativeGridFile: str
691                     native grid file name 
692    placementDir: str
693                   placement folder name
694    num: int
695           number of conformer
696    copy: int
697           number of copies for each conformer
698    threshold: float
699                threshold for energy cutoff  
700    flag_form: bool
701                whether or not the grid file is formatted
702    
703    Returns
704    -------
705    int
706        number of docking trials 
707    """
708    ## Prepare
709    idxNum = 1
710    idxCopy = 1
711    ligRotamerPDB = './ligand_rotamer.pdb'
712    hardSet = {'selection': flexSel, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': hardGridFile}
713    nativeSet = {'selection': flexSel, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': nativeGridFile}
714    _mkdir_(placementDir)
715    cmd = '''
716          obrotamer %s | convpdb.pl -segnames -setseg %s > %s 
717          ''' % (ligPDB, ligSeg, ligRotamerPDB)
718
719    ## Loop and save poses in the save dir
720    while idxNum <= num:
721
722        ## Read in random conformer and run brief minimization
723        system(cmd)
724        read.coor_card(receptorCard, selection = receptorSel)
725        read.pdb(ligRotamerPDB, resid = True)
726        minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.01)
727        minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.005)
728        totalener = threshold + energy.get_total()
729
730        ## Save conformer and side chain conformer
731        allCoor = coor.get_positions()
732        allCoor['atomIndex'] = np.arange(np.shape(list(ligSel))[0])
733        ligand_xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(ligSel)), ['x', 'y', 'z']]
734        receptor_xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(receptorSel)), ['x', 'y', 'z', 'atomIndex']]
735
736        ## Random translation and rotation and minimize in grids. 
737        i = 1
738        while i <= copy:
739
740            ## Random rotation and translation
741            new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(rand_rot_trans(ligand_xyz.to_numpy()), columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
742            new_xyz['atomIndex'] = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(ligSel)), 'atomIndex'].to_numpy()
743            new_xyz = pd.concat([receptor_xyz, new_xyz], ignore_index = True)
744            new_xyz = new_xyz.sort_values(by = ['atomIndex'], ignore_index = True)[['x', 'y', 'z']]
745            coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
746
747            ## Minimize in Grids
748            hardGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
749            hardGrid.setVar(hardSet)
750            hardGrid.read()
751            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 100)
752            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 500, tolenr = 0.01)
753            hardGrid.off()
754            hardGrid.clear()
755
756            nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
757            nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
758            nativeGrid.read()
759            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
760            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 100, tolenr = 0.01)
761            nativeGrid.off()
762            nativeGrid.clear()
763
764            ## Check energy
765            energy.show()
766            if energy.get_total() < totalener:
767                print("Flexible receptor + ligand placement ", str(idxCopy))
768                write.coor_pdb(placementDir + str(idxCopy) + ".pdb", title = '''Title
769                * The conformer ID is %d
770                * The placement ID is %d
771                * The score is %8.6f and cutoff is %8.6f '''
772                % (idxNum, i, energy.get_total(), totalener))
773                idxCopy += 1
774                i += 1
775
776        idxNum += 1
777    return num * copy

Rigid CDOCKER fast initial placement

Returns
  • int: number of docking trials
def FCDOCKER_mutation( final_result, pair_list, receptorSel=None, flexSel=None, ligSel=None, ligPDB='./ligand.pdb', ligSeg='LIGA', saveLig='./ligand/', saveProt='./protein/', crossoverLig='./r_ligand/', crossoverProt='./r_protein/', hardGridFile='grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin', nativeGridFile='grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin', placementDir='./placement/', num=20, copy=25, threshold=100, flag_form=False): 
 888def FCDOCKER_mutation(final_result, pair_list, receptorSel = None, flexSel = None,
 889                      ligSel = None, ligPDB = './ligand.pdb', ligSeg = "LIGA",
 890                      saveLig = './ligand/', saveProt = './protein/',
 891                      crossoverLig = './r_ligand/', crossoverProt = './r_protein/',
 892                      hardGridFile = 'grid-emax-3-mine--30-maxe-30.bin',
 893                      nativeGridFile = 'grid-emax-100-mine--100-maxe-100.bin',
 894                      placementDir = './placement/', num= 20, copy = 25, 
 895		      threshold = 100, flag_form = False):
 896    """Mutation in flexible CDOCKER genetic algorithm
 897
 898    Parameters
 899    ----------
 900    final_result: np.array
 901                   analyzed clustering result
 902    pair_list: np.array
 903                pair list of the crossover result
 904    receptorSel: str 
 905                  receptor selection 
 906    flexSel: str
 907              flexible part selection
 908    ligSel: str
 909             ligand selection 
 910    ligPDB: str
 911             ligand pdb file name
 912    ligSeg: str
 913             ligand segment ID
 914    saveLig: str
 915              ligand docked result saved folder name
 916    saveProt: str
 917               protein docked result saved folder name
 918    crossoverLig: str
 919                   crossover ligand folder before mutation
 920    crossoverProt: str
 921                    crossover protein folder before mutation
 922    hardGridFile: str
 923                   hard grid file name 
 924    nativeGridFile: str
 925                     native grid file name 
 926    placementDir: str
 927                   placement folder after mutation
 928    num: float
 929          number of conformer 
 930    copy: float
 931           number of copies for each conformer 
 932    threshold: float
 933                threshold for energy cutoff
 934    flag_form: bool
 935                whether or not the grid file is formatted
 936
 937    Returns
 938    -------
 939    int
 940        number of docking trials 
 941
 942    """
 943    ## Prepare
 944    idxCopy = 1
 945    hardSet = {'selection': flexSel, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': hardGridFile}
 946    nativeSet = {'selection': flexSel, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': nativeGridFile}
 947    _mkdir_(placementDir)
 948
 949    ## Get cutoff energy
 950    tmpener = []
 951    for parent in final_result[:, 0]:
 952        read.pdb(saveLig + str(parent) + ".pdb", resid = True)
 953        read.pdb(saveProt + str(parent) + ".pdb", resid = True)
 954        minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.01)
 955        minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.005)
 956        tmpener.append(energy.get_total())
 957    totalEner = np.amax(np.asarray(tmpener))
 958    mutateEner = totalEner + threshold
 959
 960    ## Loop and save poses in the save dir
 961    while idxCopy <= num * copy:
 962
 963        ## Read in ligand - protein random crossover position 
 964        ligandID = pair_list[idxCopy - 1, 0]
 965        proteinID = pair_list[idxCopy - 1, 1]
 966        read.pdb(crossoverLig + str(ligandID) + ".pdb", resid = True)
 967        read.pdb(crossoverProt + str(proteinID) + ".pdb", resid = True)
 968        minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.01)
 969        minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 50, tolenr = 0.005)
 970
 971        ## Compute energy difference
 972        ## Mutation probility cutoff based on energy difference 
 973        DEner = energy.get_total() - totalEner
 974        prob = _mutate_prob_(DEner)
 975        rand = random()
 976
 977        ## No mutation if random number smaller than the prob cutoff 
 978        if rand <= prob:
 979            print("Flexible receptor + ligand placement ", str(idxCopy))
 980            write.coor_pdb(placementDir + str(idxCopy) + ".pdb", titel = '''Title
 981            * The ligand ID is %d
 982            * The protein ID is %d
 983            * The placement ID is %d
 984            * The energy difference is %8.6f 
 985            * The mutate score is %8.6f and cutoff is %8.6f
 986            * No mutation applied'''
 987            % (ligandID, proteinID, idxCopy, DEner, rand, prob))
 988            idxCopy += 1
 989
 990        ## Perform mutation if random number smaller than the prob cutoff 
 991        else:
 992
 993            ## Save conformer and side chain conformer
 994            randomEner = mutateEner
 995            allCoor = coor.get_positions()
 996            allCoor['atomIndex'] = np.arange(np.shape(list(ligSel))[0])
 997            ligand_xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(ligSel)), ['x', 'y', 'z']]
 998            receptor_xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(receptorSel)), ['x', 'y', 'z', 'atomIndex']]
 999
1000            ## Random translation and rotation and minimize in grids. 
1001            while randomEner >= mutateEner:
1002
1003                ## Random rotation and translation
1004                new_receptor = receptor_xyz
1005                new_xyz = pd.DataFrame(rand_rot_trans(ligand_xyz.to_numpy(), max_rot = pi / 6), columns = ['x', 'y', 'z'])
1006                new_xyz['atomIndex'] = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(ligSel)), 'atomIndex'].to_numpy()
1007                new_xyz = pd.concat([new_receptor, new_xyz], ignore_index = True)
1008                new_xyz = new_xyz.sort_values(by = ['atomIndex'], ignore_index = True)[['x', 'y', 'z']]
1009                coor.set_positions(new_xyz)
1010
1011                ## Minimize in Grids
1012                hardGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
1013                hardGrid.setVar(hardSet)
1014                hardGrid.read()
1015                minimize.run_sd(nstep = 100)
1016                minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 500, tolenr = 0.01)
1017                hardGrid.off()
1018                hardGrid.clear()
1019
1020                nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
1021                nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
1022                nativeGrid.read()
1023                minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1024                minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 100, tolenr = 0.01)
1025                nativeGrid.off()
1026                nativeGrid.clear()
1027
1028                ## Check energy
1029                energy.show()
1030                randomEner = energy.get_total()
1031
1032            ## Save mutated pose 
1033            print("Flexible receptor + ligand placement ", str(idxCopy))
1034            write.coor_pdb(placementDir + str(idxCopy) + ".pdb", titel = '''Title
1035            * The ligand ID is %d
1036            * The protein ID is %d
1037            * The placement ID is %d
1038            * The energy difference is %8.6f 
1039            * The mutate score is %8.6f and cutoff is %8.6f
1040            * After mutation
1041            * The total energy is %8.6f
1042            * The cutoff energy is %8.6f'''
1043            % (ligandID, proteinID, idxCopy, DEner, rand, prob, randomEner, mutateEner))
1044            idxCopy += 1
1045
1046    return num * copy

def FCDOCKER_crossover(cluster_result, dock_result, num=20, copy=25): 
1048def FCDOCKER_crossover(cluster_result, dock_result, num = 20, copy = 25):
1049    """Crossover in flexible CDOCKER genetic algorithm
1050
1051    Parameters
1052    ----------
1053    cluster_result: np.array
1054                     clustering result using MMTSB
1055    dock_result: np.array
1056                  docking results with grid energy recorded
1057    num: float
1058          number of conformer 
1059    copy: float
1060           number of copies for each conformer 
1061
1062    Returns
1063    -------
1064    final_result: np.array
1065          analyzed clustering result
1066    np.array
1067          pair list of the crossover result
1068    """
1069    ## Sort cluster result
1070    clusterIdx = np.unique(cluster_result[:, 1])
1071    final_result = np.ones((len(clusterIdx), 2))
1072    for cluster in clusterIdx:
1073        tmpEner = []
1074        pdbIdx = cluster_result[cluster_result[:, 1] == cluster][:, 0]
1075        for pdb in pdbIdx:
1076            tmpEner.append(dock_result[dock_result[:, 1] == pdb][:, 0])
1077        cResult= pd.DataFrame()
1078        cResult['PDB'] = np.asarray(pdbIdx)
1079        cResult['Energy'] = np.asarray(tmpEner)
1080        cResult = cResult.sort_values(by = ['Energy'], ignore_index = True)
1081        final_result[cluster - 1, 0] = cResult.iloc[0]['PDB']
1082        final_result[cluster - 1, 1] = len(tmpEner)
1083        final_result = final_result.astype(int)
1084
1085    ## Perpare for crossover
1086    total = num * copy
1087    comb_pair = total // 4
1088    self_pair = total - comb_pair * 2
1089    idx = final_result[:, 0]
1090    count = final_result[:, 1]
1091
1092    ## Random crossover 
1093    tmp1 = choices(idx, weights = count, k = comb_pair)
1094    tmp2 = choices(idx, weights = count, k = comb_pair)
1095    tmp3 = choices(idx, weights = count, k = self_pair)
1096
1097    ## Create protein-ligand list
1098    total_list = np.zeros((total, 2))
1099    for i in np.arange(comb_pair):
1100        j = 2 * i
1101        k = 2 * i + 1
1102        total_list[j, 0] = tmp1[i]
1103        total_list[k, 0] = tmp2[i]
1104        total_list[j, 1] = tmp2[i]
1105        total_list[k, 1] = tmp1[i]
1106        i += 1
1107
1108    for i in np.arange(self_pair): total_list[comb_pair * 2 + i, :] = tmp3[i]
1109    return final_result, total_list.astype(int)

Crossover in flexible CDOCKER genetic algorithm

def FCDOCKER_calc_dihedral(flexchain, cluster_result, saveProt, protein_dihedral): 
1111def FCDOCKER_calc_dihedral(flexchain, cluster_result, saveProt, protein_dihedral):
1112    """Calculate dihedral angle and corresponding entropy in flexible docking
1113
1114    Parameters
1115    ----------
1116    flexchain: pd.DataFrame
1117                dataframe of the flexchain selection
1118    cluster_result: np.array
1119                     clustering result using MMTSB
1120    saveProt: str
1121               protein docked result saved folder name
1122    protein_dihedral: pd.DataFrame
1123                       protein dihedral angle look up table
1124
1125    Returns
1126    -------
1127    entropy : np.array
1128            entropy for each cluster 
1129    np.array
1130            cluster ID
1131    sc_entropy: np.array
1132            entropy for each cluster & each amino acid
1133    """
1134    ## Create entropy dataframe
1135    sc_entropy = np.zeros((len(np.unique(cluster_result[:, 1])), len(flexchain)))
1136    
1137    ## Loop through flexible chains 
1138    for idx, row in flexchain.iterrows():
1139        tmp = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_res_and_type(row['seg_id'],
1140                                     str(row['res_id']), 'C')
1141        resname = tmp.get_res_names()[0]
1142        atoms = protein_dihedral.loc[protein_dihedral['Amino_acid'] == resname].to_numpy()
1143        if (len(atoms) > 0):
1144            tmp_result = np.zeros((len(cluster_result), len(atoms) + 1))
1145            print("Calculate conformational entropy contribution from amino acid ", resname)
1146
1147            ## Loop through clustered pdbs
1148            for trial in np.arange(len(cluster_result)):
1149                pdbID = cluster_result[trial, 0]
1150                read.pdb(saveProt + str(pdbID) + ".pdb", resid = True)
1151                allCoor = coor.get_positions()
1152
1153                for dihe_set in np.arange(len(atoms)): 
1154                    dihe = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_res_and_type(row['seg_id'],
1155                                    str(row['res_id']), atoms[dihe_set, 1])
1156                    xyz = allCoor.loc[np.asarray(list(dihe))].to_numpy()
1157                    tmp_result[trial, dihe_set] = calc_dihedral(xyz)
1158            
1159            ## Post processing
1160            if resname != 'PHE' or resname != 'TYR':
1161                tmp_result[(tmp_result >= 0) & (tmp_result < 120)] = 1
1162                tmp_result[(tmp_result > -120) & (tmp_result < 0)] = 2
1163                tmp_result[(tmp_result <= -120) | (tmp_result >= 120)] = 3
1164            else:
1165                tmp_result[:, 0][(tmp_result[:, 0] >= 0) & (tmp_result[:, 0] < 120)] = 1
1166                tmp_result[:, 0][(tmp_result[:, 0] > -120) & (tmp_result[:, 0] < 0)] = 2
1167                tmp_result[:, 0][(tmp_result[:, 0] <= -120) | (tmp_result[:, 0] >= 120)] = 3
1168
1169                tmp_result[:, 1][(tmp_result[:, 1] >= -45) & (tmp_result[:, 1] <= 45)] = 0
1170                tmp_result[:, 1][(tmp_result[:, 1] < -135) | (tmp_result[:, 1] > 135)] = 0
1171                tmp_result[:, 1][(tmp_result[:, 1] >= -135) & (tmp_result[:, 1] < -45)] = 1
1172                tmp_result[:, 1][(tmp_result[:, 1] > 45) & (tmp_result[:, 1] <= 135)] = 1
1173            tmp_result[:, dihe_set + 1] = cluster_result[:, 1]
1174
1175            for trial in np.unique(cluster_result[:, 1]):
1176                tmp_total = []
1177                tmpEntropy = tmp_result[tmp_result[:, -1] == trial][:, 0:len(atoms)]
1178                tmp_total.append(len(tmpEntropy))
1179                state = np.unique(tmpEntropy, axis = 0)
1180                for tmpI in np.arange(len(state)):
1181                    tmp_total.append(np.sum((tmpEntropy == state[tmpI]).all(axis = 1)))
1182
1183                tmp_total = np.asarray(tmp_total)
1184                tmp_total = tmp_total / tmp_total[0]
1185                result = np.sum(tmp_total * np.log(tmp_total))
1186                sc_entropy[trial - 1, idx] = result
1187
1188    entropy = np.sum(sc_entropy, axis = 1) * 0.593
1189    return entropy, np.unique(cluster_result[:, 1]), sc_entropy

1275    """Find the best clustering radius
1276    Default use in rigid CDOCKER
1277
1278    Parameters
1279    ----------
1280    name: str
