def sort_cluster(pdb_files, dock_result, sort_method): 
1332def sort_cluster(pdb_files, dock_result, sort_method):
1333    """Sort clustering results
1334
1335    Parameters
1336    ----------
1337    pdb_files : np.array 
1338                pdb names of docked poses 
1339    dock_result : pd.DataFrame
1340                  docking results (i.e., energy)
1341    sort_method : str
1342                  sorting based on sort_method
1343
1344    Returns
1345    -------
1346    tmpResult: pd.DataFrame
1347         sorted results  
1348    """
1349    tmpEner = []
1350    cluster_size = np.size(pdb_files)
1351    if cluster_size > 1:
1352        for poseID in pdb_files: 
1353            tmpEner.append(dock_result[dock_result['PDB_name'] == poseID][sort_method].values[0])
1354 
1355        tmpEner = np.asarray(tmpEner)
1356        minPose = pdb_files[tmpEner == np.amin(tmpEner)][0]
1357        tmpResult = dock_result[dock_result['PDB_name'] == minPose]
1358    else:
1359        print("Cluster only have one cluster member")
1360        tmpResult = dock_result[dock_result['PDB_name'] == pdb_files]
1361
1362    tmp = pd.DataFrame(np.asarray([cluster_size]), columns = ['cluster_size'])
1363    tmp = tmp.astype(str)
1364    tmpResult = tmpResult.join(tmp.set_index(tmpResult.index))
1365    return tmpResult

1473                whether or not grid form is formatted
1474    flag_delete_grid: bool
1475                       whether or not delete grid after calculation 
1476    probeFile: str
1477                gpu probe file names
1478    softGridFile: str
1479                   soft grid file name 
1480    hardGridFile: str
1481                   hard grid file name 
1482    nativeGridFile: str
1483                     native grid file name 
1484    receptorPDB: str 
1485              protein pdb file name
1486    receptorPSF: str 
1487              protein psf file name
1488    ligPDB: str
1489             ligand pdb file name
1490    ligSeg: str
1491             ligand segment ID
1492    confDir: str
1493              conformer folder name
1494    placementDir: str
1495                   placement folder name
1496    exhaustiveness: str
1497                     exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
1498    numPlace: int 
1499               number of placement for each conformer 
1500    numCopy: int 
1501              number of Copy for OpenMM docking simulated annealing
1502    flag_delete_conformer: bool
1503                            whether or not delete conformer after docking 
1504    flag_delete_placement: bool
1505                            whether or not delete placement after docking 
1506    flag_save_all: bool
1507                    whether or not save all docked pose 
1508    flag_save_cluster: bool
1509                        whether or not save clustered results 
1510    flag_save_top: bool
1511                    whether or not save top 10 lowest energy pose 
1512    flag_suppress_print: bool
1513                          whether or not suppress printing
1514    flag_fast_grid: bool
1515                     whether or not just use grid minimize result i.e., skip all atom mini
1516    flag_center_ligand: bool
1517                         whether or not ligand need to be centered
1518    flag_use_hbond : bool
1519                     whether or not use hydrogen/covalent bond in RCDOCKER 
1520    flag_fast_placement : bool
1521                          whether or not use fast placement
1522    threshold : float
1523                cutoff threshold for original RCDOCKER placement
1524                only meaningful when flag_fast_placement = True
1525    sort_energy: str
1526                  sorting method 
1527    saveDir: str
1528              folder name for docked result 
1529
1530    Returns
1531    -------
1532    clusterResult : pd.DataFrame
1533         clustering result 
1534    dockResult : pd.DataFrame
1535         docking result 
1536    """
1537    ## Generate grids for docking if no grid files generated before
1538    if not flag_grid:
1539        if hmax > 0: hmax = 0
1540        if not flag_use_hbond: hmax = 0
1541        if psf.get_natom() > 0: psf.delete_atoms()
1542        read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
1543        read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
1544
1545        genGrid = grid.Grid()
1546        gridSet = {'xCen': xcen, 'yCen': ycen, 'zCen': zcen,
1547                   'xMax': maxlen, 'yMax': maxlen, 'zMax': maxlen,
1548                   'dielec': dielec, 'flag_rdie': flag_rdie,
1549                   'rcta': rcta, 'rctb': rctb, 'hMax': hmax,
1550                   'emax': 0.6, 'maxe': 0.4, 'mine': -0.4, 'gridFile': softGridFile,
1551                   'probeFile': probeFile, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'flag_grhb' : flag_use_hbond} 
1552        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
1553        status = genGrid.generate()
1554        print("Grid generation for " + softGridFile +  " is ", status)
1555
1556        gridSet = {'emax': 3, 'maxe': 30, 'mine': -30, 'gridFile': hardGridFile}
1557        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
1558        status = genGrid.generate()
1559        print("Grid generation for " + hardGridFile +  " is ", status)
1560
1561        gridSet = {'emax': 100, 'maxe': 100, 'mine': -100, 'gridFile': nativeGridFile}
1562        genGrid.setVar(gridSet)
1563        status = genGrid.generate()
1564        print("Grid generation for " + nativeGridFile +  " is ", status)
1565
1566        ## Update nonbond interactions
1567        if flag_rdie:
1568            update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1569              atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1570              elec = True, rdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1571              emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1572        else:
1573            update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1574              atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1575              elec = True, cdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1576              emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1577
1578    ## Ligand initial placement
1579    if flag_suppress_print:
1580        settings.set_verbosity(1)
1581        settings.set_warn_level(1)
1582        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
1583
1584    if flag_fast_placement :
1585        numConf, numPlace = RCDOCKER_fast_init_place(receptorPDB = receptorPDB, receptorPSF = receptorPSF,
1586                            ligPDB = ligPDB, ligSeg = ligSeg, confDir = confDir,
1587                            placementDir = placementDir, exhaustiveness = exhaustiveness,
1588                            flag_center_ligand = flag_center_ligand, xcen = xcen,
1589                            ycen = ycen, zcen = zcen, numPlace = numPlace)
1590    else :
1591        numConf, numPlace = RCDOCKER_init_place(ligPDB = ligPDB, ligSeg = ligSeg,
1592                            hardGridFile = hardGridFile, nativeGridFile = nativeGridFile,
1593                            confDir = confDir, placementDir = placementDir,
1594                            flag_center_ligand = flag_center_ligand,
1595                            flag_use_hbond = flag_use_hbond, flag_form = flag_form,
1596                            flag_rdie = flag_rdie, dielec = dielec,
1597                            xcen = xcen, ycen = ycen, zcen = zcen,
1598                            numPlace = numPlace, threshold = threshold)
1599
1600    settings.set_verbosity(5)
1601    settings.set_warn_level(5)
1602    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1603
1604    ## Update nonbond interactions
1605    if flag_rdie:
1606        update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1607          atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1608          elec = True, rdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1609          emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1610    else:
1611        update_nonbond = pycharmm.UpdateNonBondedScript(
1612          atom = True, switch = True, vswitch = True, vdwe = True,
1613          elec = True, cdie = True, cutnb = 12, ctofnb = 10, ctonnb = 8,
1614          emax = 10000, maxe = 10000, mine = -10000, epsilon = dielec).run()
1615
1616    ## Get docking trials / number of OpenMM docking needed
1617    num = numConf * numPlace 
1618    trial = num // numCopy
1619    remindar = num % numCopy
1620    dockResult = np.zeros([num, 2])
1621
1622    ## Run OMMD docking
1623    idxBatch = 0
1624    gridVdw = []
1625    gridElec = []
1626    gridHbon = []
1627    totalEner = []
1628    allPose = []
1629    conformerPose = []
1630    placementPose = []
1631    placementID = 1
1632    conformerID = 1
1633    ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms(seg_id = ligSeg) 
1634
1635    if remindar > 0:
1636        ommd = grid.OMMD()
1637        ommdSet = {'softGridFile': softGridFile, 'hardGridFile': hardGridFile,
1638                   'flex_select': ligand, 'numCopy': remindar, 
1639                   'flag_form' : flag_form, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
1640        ommd.setVar(ommdSet)
1641        ommd.create()
1642        print("OMMD set up for batch ", idxBatch)
1643        
1644        if flag_suppress_print:
1645            settings.set_verbosity(1)
1646            settings.set_warn_level(1)
1647            settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
1648
1649        idxCopy = 1
1650        while idxCopy <= remindar:
1651            read.pdb(placementDir + str(placementID) + '.pdb', resid = True)
1652            ommd.set_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1653            print("Set OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1654            placementID += 1
1655            idxCopy += 1
1656 
1657        default_ommd_sian(ommd)
1658 
1659        nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
1660        nativeSet = {'selection': ligand, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': 
1661                      nativeGridFile, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
1662        nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
1663        nativeGrid.read()
1664        
1665        i = 1
1666        idxCopy = 1
1667        while idxCopy <= remindar:
1668            ommd.copy_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1669            print("Minimize OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1670            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1671            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 1e-3)
1672            allEner = energy.get_energy()
1673            dockPose = str(conformerID) + "_" + str(i) + ".pdb"
1674            tmpTotal = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'energy']['value'].values[0] 
1675            tmpGrvdw = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grvdw']['value'].values[0]
1676            tmpGrelec = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grelec']['value'].values[0] 
1677            tmpGrhb = energy.get_eterm(111)
1678            write.coor_pdb(dockPose, title = '''Title
1679                       * The conformer ID is %d 
1680                       * The dock pose ID is %d
1681                       * The total energy is %8.6f 
1682                       * The total grid energy is %8.6f
1683                       * Grid vdw, elec and hbond energy is 
1684                       * %8.6f, %8.6f and %8.6f''' 
1685                       % (conformerID, i, tmpTotal, tmpGrvdw + tmpGrelec + tmpGrhb, 
1686                       tmpGrvdw, tmpGrelec, tmpGrhb)) 
1687            totalEner.append(tmpTotal)
1688            gridVdw.append(tmpGrvdw)
1689            gridElec.append(tmpGrelec)
1690            gridHbon.append(tmpGrhb)
1691            conformerPose.append(conformerID)
1692            placementPose.append(i)
1693            allPose.append(dockPose)
1694            i += 1
1695            if i > numPlace:
1696                i = 1
1697                conformerID += 1
1698            idxCopy += 1
1699 
1700        nativeGrid.off()
1701        nativeGrid.clear()
1702        nativeSet.clear()
1703        ommd.clear()
1704        ommdSet.clear()
1705        settings.set_verbosity(5)
1706        settings.set_warn_level(5)
1707        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1708
1709    idxBatch += 1
1710    if idxBatch <= trial:
1711        ommd = grid.OMMD()
1712        ommdSet = {'softGridFile': softGridFile, 'hardGridFile': hardGridFile,  
1713                   'flex_select': ligand, 'numCopy': numCopy,
1714                   'flag_form' : flag_form, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond}
1715        ommd.setVar(ommdSet)
1716        ommd.create()
1717 
1718        if flag_suppress_print:
1719            settings.set_verbosity(1)
1720            settings.set_warn_level(1)
1721            settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
1722
1723        while idxBatch <= trial:
1724            print("OMMD set up for batch ", idxBatch) 
1725            
1726            idxCopy = 1
1727            while idxCopy <= numCopy:
1728                read.pdb(placementDir + str(placementID) + '.pdb', resid = True)
1729                ommd.set_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1730                print("Set OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1731                placementID += 1
1732                idxCopy += 1
1733  
1734            default_ommd_sian(ommd)
1735  
1736            nativeGrid = grid.CDOCKER()
1737            nativeSet = {'selection': ligand, 'flag_form' : flag_form, 'gridFile': 
1738                          nativeGridFile, 'flag_grhb': flag_use_hbond} 
1739            nativeGrid.setVar(nativeSet)
1740            nativeGrid.read()
1741 
1742            i = 1
1743            idxCopy = 1
1744            while idxCopy <= numCopy:
1745                ommd.copy_coor(idxCopy = idxCopy)
1746                print("Minimize OMMD ligand copy " + str(idxCopy))
1747                minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1748                minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 1e-3)
1749                allEner = energy.get_energy()
1750                dockPose = str(conformerID) + "_" + str(i) + ".pdb"
1751                tmpTotal = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'energy']['value'].values[0] 
1752                tmpGrvdw = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grvdw']['value'].values[0]
1753                tmpGrelec = allEner[allEner['name'] == 'grelec']['value'].values[0] 
1754                tmpGrhb = energy.get_eterm(111)
1755                write.coor_pdb(dockPose, title = '''Title
1756                           * The conformer ID is %d 
1757                           * The dock pose ID is %d
1758                           * The total energy is %8.6f 
1759                           * The total grid energy is %8.6f
1760                           * Grid vdw, elec and hbond energy is 
1761                           * %8.6f, %8.6f and %8.6f''' 
1762                           % (conformerID, i, tmpTotal, tmpGrvdw + tmpGrelec + tmpGrhb, 
1763                           tmpGrvdw, tmpGrelec, tmpGrhb)) 
1764                totalEner.append(tmpTotal)
1765                gridVdw.append(tmpGrvdw)
1766                gridElec.append(tmpGrelec)
1767                gridHbon.append(tmpGrhb)
1768                conformerPose.append(conformerID)
1769                placementPose.append(i)
1770                allPose.append(dockPose)
1771                i += 1
1772                if i > numPlace:
1773                    i = 1
1774                    conformerID += 1
1775                idxCopy += 1
1776 
1777            nativeGrid.off()
1778            nativeGrid.clear()
1779            nativeSet.clear() 
1780            idxBatch += 1
1781 
1782        ommd.clear()
1783        ommdSet.clear()
1784        settings.set_verbosity(5)
1785        settings.set_warn_level(5)
1786        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1787
1788    ## Save docking result for all docked pose
1789    dockResult = pd.DataFrame()
1790    dockResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
1791    dockResult["grid_total"] = np.asarray(gridVdw) + np.asarray(gridElec) + np.asarray(gridHbon)
1792    dockResult["grid_vdw"] = gridVdw
1793    dockResult["grid_elec"] = gridElec
1794    dockResult["grid_hbond"] = gridHbon
1795    dockResult["conformer_id"] = conformerPose
1796    dockResult["placement_id"] = placementPose
1797    dockResult["PDB_name"] = allPose
1798
1799    ## Cluster and sort docking pose
1800    conformerID = 1
1801    clusterResult = pd.DataFrame(columns = list(dockResult.columns).append('cluster_size'))
1802    while conformerID <= numConf:
1803        conformerName = str(conformerID) + '_*'
1804        radius = scan_cluster_radius(name = conformerName)
1805        tmp = rcdocker_default_sort(radius = radius, name = conformerName)
1806 
1807        clusterResult = pd.concat([clusterResult, sort_cluster(pdb_files = tmp,
1808                       dock_result = dockResult, sort_method = "total_energy")],
1809                       ignore_index = True)
1810 
1811        conformerID += 1
1812
1813    ## Sort dataframe and save grid docking results 
1814    _mkdir_(saveDir)
1815    dockResult = dockResult.sort_values(by = ["total_energy"], ignore_index = True)
1816    dockResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'dockResult.tsv', sep = '	')
1817    clusterResult = clusterResult.sort_values(by = ["total_energy"], ignore_index = True)
1818    clusterResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'clusterResult.tsv', sep = '	')
1819
1820    ## Explicit atom minimization
1821    if not flag_fast_grid:
1822        psf.delete_atoms()
1823        read.psf_card(receptorPSF, append = True)
1824        read.pdb(receptorPDB, resid = True)
1825        read.sequence_pdb(ligPDB)
1826        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)        ## for 3-mem ring
1827        gen.new_segment(seg_name = ligSeg)
1828        settings.set_bomb_level(0)
1829        read.pdb(ligPDB, resid = True)
1830        ligand = pycharmm.SelectAtoms().by_seg_id(ligSeg)
1831        cons_fix.setup(ligand.__invert__())
1832
1833    ## Minimize cluster result
1834        vdw = []
1835        elec = []
1836        totalEner = []
1837        _rm_("cluster_*")
1838        pdbID = clusterResult['PDB_name'].tolist()
1839        grid_hbond = clusterResult['grid_hbond'].tolist()
1840        conformer_id = clusterResult["conformer_id"].tolist() 
1841        placement_id = clusterResult["placement_id"].tolist()
1842        cluster_size = clusterResult["cluster_size"].tolist()
1843        for idx in np.arange(len(pdbID)):
1844            read.pdb(str(pdbID[idx]), resid = True)
1845            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1846            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 0.001)
1847            tmptotal = energy.get_total() + grid_hbond[idx]
1848            tmpelec = energy.get_elec()
1849            tmpvdw = energy.get_vdw()
1850            totalEner.append(tmptotal)
1851            elec.append(tmpelec)
1852            vdw.append(tmpvdw)
1853        
1854            write.coor_pdb("cluster_" + str(pdbID[idx]),
1855                           selection = ligand, title = '''Title
1856                           * The docked pose ID is %s
1857                           * The conformer ID is %d
1858                           * The placement ID is %d
1859                           * The total energy is %8.6f
1860                           * The vdw energy is %8.6f
1861                           * The elec energy is %8.6f
1862                           * The grid_hbond is %8.6f '''
1863                           % (pdbID[idx], conformer_id[idx], placement_id[idx], 
1864                           tmptotal, tmpvdw, tmpelec, grid_hbond[idx]))
1865
1866        explicitCluster = pd.DataFrame()
1867        explicitCluster["total_energy"] = totalEner
1868        explicitCluster["vdw"] = vdw
1869        explicitCluster["elec"] = elec
1870        explicitCluster["grid_hbond"] = grid_hbond
1871        explicitCluster["conformer_id"] = conformer_id
1872        explicitCluster["placement_id"] = placement_id
1873        explicitCluster["PDB_name"] = pdbID
1874        explicitCluster["cluster_size"] = cluster_size
1875
1876	## Minimize top10 result
1877        vdw = []
1878        elec = []
1879        totalEner = []
1880        _rm_("top10_*")
1881        pdbID = dockResult['PDB_name'].tolist()[0:11]
1882        grid_hbond = dockResult['grid_hbond'].tolist()[0:11]
1883        conformer_id = dockResult["conformer_id"].tolist()[0:11]
1884        placement_id = dockResult["placement_id"].tolist()[0:11]
1885        for idx in np.arange(len(pdbID)):
1886            read.pdb(str(pdbID[idx]), resid = True)
1887            minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
1888            minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 0.001)
1889            tmptotal = energy.get_total() + grid_hbond[idx]
1890            tmpelec = energy.get_elec()
1891            tmpvdw = energy.get_vdw()
1892            totalEner.append(tmptotal)
1893            elec.append(tmpelec)
1894            vdw.append(tmpvdw)
1895        
1896            write.coor_pdb("top10_" + str(pdbID[idx]),
1897                           selection = ligand, title = '''Title
1898                           * The docked pose ID is %s
1899                           * The conformer ID is %d
1900                           * The placement ID is %d
1901                           * The total energy is %8.6f
1902                           * The vdw energy is %8.6f
1903                           * The elec energy is %8.6f
1904                           * The grid_hbond is %8.6f '''
1905                           % (pdbID[idx], conformer_id[idx], placement_id[idx], 
1906                           tmptotal, tmpvdw, tmpelec, grid_hbond[idx]))
1907
1908        explicitTop10 = pd.DataFrame()
1909        explicitTop10["total_energy"] = totalEner
1910        explicitTop10["vdw"] = vdw
1911        explicitTop10["elec"] = elec
1912        explicitTop10["grid_hbond"] = grid_hbond
1913        explicitTop10["conformer_id"] = conformer_id
1914        explicitTop10["placement_id"] = placement_id
1915        explicitTop10["PDB_name"] = pdbID
1916
1917    ## Sort dataframe and save explicit atom minimization results 
1918    if not flag_fast_grid:
1919        explicitTop10 = explicitTop10.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], 
1920                        ignore_index = True)
1921        explicitTop10.to_csv(saveDir + 'explicitTop10.tsv', sep = '	')
1922        explicitCluster = explicitCluster.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], 
1923                          ignore_index = True)
1924        explicitCluster.to_csv(saveDir + 'explicitCluster.tsv', sep = '	')
1925
1926    ## Clean and save results
1927    if flag_save_cluster:
1928        idx = 1
1929        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'cluster/')
1930        print("Save cluster result for each conformer")
1931        if flag_fast_grid:
1932            pdbList = clusterResult['PDB_name'].tolist()
1933            for pdb in pdbList:
1934                source = str(pdb)
1935                target = saveDir + 'cluster/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1936                _cp_(source, target)
1937                idx += 1
1938        else:
1939            pdbList = explicitCluster['PDB_name'].tolist()
1940            for pdb in pdbList:
1941                source = "cluster_" + str(pdb)
1942                target = saveDir + 'cluster/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1943                _cp_(source, target)
1944                idx += 1
1945
1946    if flag_save_top:
1947        idx = 1
1948        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'top_ener/')
1949        print("Save top 10 lowest energy pose")
1950        if flag_fast_grid:
1951            pdbList = dockResult['PDB_name'].tolist()[0:11]
1952            topEnergy = dockResult["total_energy"].tolist()[0:10]
1953            if topEnergy[-1] - topEnergy[0] < 1: 
1954                print("Please check dockResult.tsv, not all poses within 1 kcal/mol cutoff are saved")
1955            for pdb in pdbList[0:10]:
1956                source = str(pdb)
1957                target = saveDir + 'top_ener/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1958                _cp_(source, target)
1959                idx += 1
1960        else:
1961            pdbList = explicitTop10['PDB_name'].tolist()[0:11]
1962            topEnergy = explicitTop10[sort_energy].tolist()[0:10]
1963            if topEnergy[-1] - topEnergy[0] < 1: 
1964                print("Please check explicitTop10.tsv, not all poses within 1 kcal/mol cutoff are saved")
1965            for pdb in pdbList[0:10]:
1966                source = "top10_" + str(pdb)
1967                target = saveDir + 'top_ener/top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
1968                _cp_(source, target)
1969                idx += 1
1970
1971    if flag_save_all: 
1972        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'allPose/')
1973        _mv_('[0-9]*', saveDir + 'allPose/')
1974
1975    if not flag_fast_grid: _rm_("cluster_* top10_*")
1976    if flag_delete_conformer: _rm_(confDir)
1977    if flag_delete_placement: _rm_(placementDir)
1978    if flag_delete_grid: _rm_(nativeGridFile + ' ' + softGridFile + ' ' + hardGridFile) 
1979
1980    _rm_('[0-9]* tmp* cluster.log')
1981    return clusterResult, dockResult

Rigid CDOCKER standard docking method

Parameters
  • xcen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • ycen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • zcen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • maxlen (float): size of the grid box
  • dielec (float): dielectric constant
  • rcta (float): customizable grid left cutoff
  • rctb (float): customizable grid right cutoff
  • hmax (float): customizable grid well-depth
  • flag_grid (bool): whether or not grid need to be generated
  • flag_rdie (bool): true for rdie, false for cdie
  • flag_form (bool): whether or not grid form is formatted
  • flag_delete_grid (bool): whether or not delete grid after calculation
  • probeFile (str): gpu probe file names
  • softGridFile (str): soft grid file name
  • hardGridFile (str): hard grid file name
  • nativeGridFile (str): native grid file name
  • receptorPDB (str): protein pdb file name
  • receptorPSF (str): protein psf file name
  • ligPDB (str): ligand pdb file name
  • ligSeg (str): ligand segment ID
  • confDir (str): conformer folder name
  • placementDir (str): placement folder name
  • exhaustiveness (str): exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
  • numPlace (int): number of placement for each conformer
  • numCopy (int): number of Copy for OpenMM docking simulated annealing
  • flag_delete_conformer (bool): whether or not delete conformer after docking
  • flag_delete_placement (bool): whether or not delete placement after docking
  • flag_save_all (bool): whether or not save all docked pose
  • flag_save_cluster (bool): whether or not save clustered results
  • flag_save_top (bool): whether or not save top 10 lowest energy pose
  • flag_suppress_print (bool): whether or not suppress printing
  • flag_fast_grid (bool): whether or not just use grid minimize result i.e., skip all atom mini
  • flag_center_ligand (bool): whether or not ligand need to be centered
  • flag_use_hbond (bool): whether or not use hydrogen/covalent bond in RCDOCKER
  • flag_fast_placement (bool): whether or not use fast placement
  • threshold (float): cutoff threshold for original RCDOCKER placement only meaningful when flag_fast_placement = True
  • sort_energy (str): sorting method
  • saveDir (str): folder name for docked result
Returns
  • clusterResult (pd.DataFrame): clustering result
  • dockResult (pd.DataFrame): docking result

2476    if flag_suppress_print:
2477        settings.set_verbosity(1)
2478        settings.set_warn_level(1)
2479        settings.set_bomb_level(-1)
2480
2481    for idx in np.arange(len(pdbID)):
2482        read.pdb(saveLig + str(pdbID[idx]) + ".pdb", resid = True)
2483        read.pdb(saveProt + str(pdbID[idx]) + ".pdb", resid = True)
2484        minimize.run_sd(nstep = 50)
2485        minimize.run_abnr(nstep = 1000, tolenr = 0.001)
2486        tmptotal = energy.get_total() + entropy[idx]
2487        tmpelec = energy.get_elec()
2488        tmpvdw = energy.get_vdw()
2489        totalEner.append(tmptotal)
2490        elec.append(tmpelec)
2491        vdw.append(tmpvdw)
2492    
2493        write.coor_pdb('tmpligand/' + str(pdbID[idx]) + '.pdb',
2494                       selection = ligand, title = '''Title
2495                       * The docked pose ID is %d
2496                       * The cluster ID is %d
2497                       * The total energy is %8.6f
2498                       * The vdw energy is %8.6f
2499                       * The elec energy is %8.6f
2500                       * The entropy is %8.6f '''
2501                       % (pdbID[idx], clusterID[idx], tmptotal, 
2502                       tmpvdw, tmpelec, entropy[idx]))
2503    
2504        write.coor_pdb('tmpprot/' + str(pdbID[idx]) + '.pdb',
2505                       selection = flexSideChain, title = '''Title
2506                       * The docked pose ID is %d
2507                       * The cluster ID is %d
2508                       * The total energy is %8.6f
2509                       * The vdw energy is %8.6f
2510                       * The elec energy is %8.6f
2511                       * The entropy is %8.6f '''
2512                       % (pdbID[idx], clusterID[idx], tmptotal, 
2513                       tmpvdw, tmpelec, entropy[idx]))
2514    
2515    settings.set_verbosity(5)
2516    settings.set_warn_level(5)
2517    settings.set_bomb_level(0)
2518	
2519    ## Save docking result
2520    clusterResult = pd.DataFrame()
2521    if flag_fast_grid:
2522        clusterResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
2523        clusterResult["enthalpy"] = np.asarray(totalEner) - entropy
2524        clusterResult["vdw"] = vdw
2525        clusterResult["elec"] = elec
2526        clusterResult["entropy"] = entropy
2527        clusterResult["cluster_size"] = cluster_size
2528        clusterResult["PDB_name"] = pdbID
2529        clusterResult["cluster_id"] = clusterID
2530    else: 
2531        explicitResult = pd.DataFrame()
2532        explicitResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
2533        explicitResult["enthalpy"] = np.asarray(totalEner) - entropy
2534        explicitResult["vdw"] = vdw
2535        explicitResult["elec"] = elec
2536        explicitResult["entropy"] = entropy
2537        explicitResult["PDB_name"] = pdbID
2538        explicitResult["cluster_id"] = cluster_result[:, 1]
2539        
2540        vdw = []
2541        elec = []
2542        pdbID = []
2543        entropy = []
2544        totalEner = []
2545        clusterID = np.unique(clusterID)
2546        for cluster in clusterID: 
2547            tmp_result = explicitResult.loc[explicitResult['cluster_id'] == cluster]
2548            tmp_result = tmp_result.sort_values(by = ['enthalpy'], ignore_index = True)
2549            pdbID.append(tmp_result.iloc[0]['PDB_name'])
2550            tmp_result = tmp_result.to_numpy()
2551
2552            ## Get probability and ensemble average
2553            enthalpy = tmp_result[:, 1]
2554            enthalpy = enthalpy - np.amin(enthalpy)
2555            prob = - (1 / 0.593) * enthalpy
2556            prob = np.exp(prob)
2557            prob = prob / np.sum(prob)
2558            tmptotal = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 1] * prob)
2559            tmpvdw = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 2] * prob)
2560            tmpelec = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 3] * prob)
2561            tmpentropy = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 4] * prob)
2562            tmpcluster = np.sum(tmp_result[:, 6] * prob)
2563
2564            vdw.append(tmpvdw)
2565            elec.append(tmpelec)
2566            entropy.append(tmpentropy)
2567            totalEner.append(tmptotal + tmpentropy)
2568    
2569        pdbID = np.asarray(pdbID)
2570        pdbID = pdbID.astype(int)
2571        clusterResult["total_energy"] = totalEner
2572        clusterResult["enthalpy"] = np.asarray(totalEner) - np.asarray(entropy)
2573        clusterResult["vdw"] = vdw
2574        clusterResult["elec"] = elec
2575        clusterResult["entropy"] = entropy
2576        clusterResult["cluster_size"] = cluster_size
2577        clusterResult["PDB_name"] = pdbID
2578        clusterResult["cluster_id"] = clusterID
2579
2580    dockResult = pd.DataFrame()
2581    dockResult["enthalpy"] = dock_result[:, 0]
2582    dockResult["PDB_name"] = dock_result[:, 1].astype(int)
2583    dockResult = dockResult.sort_values(by = ["enthalpy"], ignore_index = True)
2584
2585    ## Sort dataframe and save results
2586    clusterResult = clusterResult.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], ignore_index = True)
2587    pdbList = clusterResult['PDB_name'].tolist()
2588    idx = 1
2589    _mkdir_(saveLigFinal + ' ' + saveProtFinal)
2590    for pdb in pdbList:
2591        ## Copy Ligand
2592        source = 'tmpligand/' + str(pdb) + '.pdb'
2593        target = saveLigFinal + 'top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
2594        _cp_(source, target)
2595    
2596        ## Copy protein
2597        source = 'tmpprot/' + str(pdb) + '.pdb'
2598        target = saveProtFinal + 'top_' + str(idx) + '.pdb'
2599        _cp_(source, target)
2600    
2601        idx += 1
2602    
2603    ## Clean and save results
2604    _mkdir_(saveDir)
2605    _mv_('cluster.log', saveDir)
2606    clusterResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'clusterResult.tsv', sep = '	')
2607    dockResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'dockResult.tsv', sep = '	')
2608
2609    if not flag_fast_grid: 
2610        explicitResult = explicitResult.sort_values(by = [sort_energy], ignore_index = True)
2611        explicitResult.to_csv(saveDir + 'explicitResult.tsv', sep = '	')
2612    if flag_save_placement: _mv_(placementDir, saveDir)
2613    if flag_save_all:
2614        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'dock_pose/')
2615        _mv_(saveLig + ' ' + saveProt, saveDir + 'dock_pose/')
2616    if flag_save_cluster:
2617        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'cluster/')
2618        _mv_(saveLigFinal, saveDir + 'cluster/ligand/')
2619        _mv_(saveProtFinal, saveDir + 'cluster/protein/')
2620    if flag_save_crossover and generation > 1:
2621        _mkdir_(saveDir + 'crossover/')
2622        _mv_(crossoverLig, saveDir + 'crossover/')
2623        _mv_(crossoverProt, saveDir + 'crossover/')
2624    if flag_delete_grid: _rm_(nativeGridFile + ' ' + softGridFile + ' ' + hardGridFile) 
2625
2626    _rm_(saveLig + ' ' + saveProt + ' ' + saveLigFinal + ' ' + saveProtFinal + ' ' + crossoverLig + ' ' + crossoverProt)
2627    _rm_('cluster* [0-9]* tmp* *crd ligand_rotamer.pdb ' + placementDir)
2628
2629    return clusterResult, dockResult

Flexible CDOCKER standard docking method

Parameters
  • xcen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • ycen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • zcen (float): center of the docking pocket
  • maxlen (float): size of the grid box
  • num (float): number of conformer
  • copy (float): number of copies for each conformer
  • threshold_init (float): energy threshold for initial placement
  • threshold_mutate (float): energy threshold for mutation
  • flag_grid (bool): whether or not grid need to be generated
  • flag_form (bool): whether or not grid form is formatted
  • flag_delete_grid (bool): whether or not delete grid after calculation
  • probeFile (str): gpu probe file names
  • softGridFile (str): soft grid file name
  • hardGridFile (str): hard grid file name
  • nativeGridFile (str): native grid file name
  • receptorPDB (str): protein pdb file name
  • receptorPSF (str): protein psf file name
  • receptorCard (str): receptor coordinate card name
  • saveLig (str): ligand docked result saved folder name
  • saveProt (str): protein docked result saved folder name
  • crossoverLig (str): crossover ligand folder before mutation
  • crossoverProt (str): crossover protein folder before mutation
  • saveLigFinal (str): ligand final docked result saved folder name
  • saveProtFinal (str): protein final docked result saved folder name
  • ligPDB (str): ligand pdb file name
  • ligSeg (str): ligand segment ID
  • flexchain (pd.DataFrame): dataframe of the flexchain selection
  • placementDir (str): placement folder name
  • flag_save_all (bool): whether or not save all docked pose
  • flag_save_cluster (bool): whether or not save clustered results
  • flag_save_placement (bool): whether or not save inital placement after docking
  • flag_save_crossover (bool): whether or not save crossover after docking
  • flag_suppress_print (bool): whether or not suppress printing
  • flag_center_ligand (bool): whether or not ligand need to be centered
  • flag_fast_grid (bool): whether or not just use grid minimize result i.e., skip all atom mini
  • flag_fast_placement (bool): whether or not use fast initial placement
  • exhaustiveness (str): exhaustiveness for fast placement, high, medium, low
  • top_N_result (int): number of top N clusters, final generation uses top N + 5 clusters
  • sort_energy (str): sorting method
  • saveDir (str): folder name for docked result
Returns
  • clusterResult (pd.DataFrame): clustering result
  • dockResult (pd.DataFrame): docking result
